205 // To avoid accidentally taking ownership of core OpenCL types
206 // such as cl_kernel constructors are made explicit
207 // under OpenCL 1.2
208 #if defined(CL_VERSION_1_2) && !defined(CL_USE_DEPRECATED_OPENCL_1_1_APIS)
209 #define __CL_EXPLICIT_CONSTRUCTORS explicit
210 #else // #if defined(CL_USE_DEPRECATED_OPENCL_1_1_APIS)
211 #define __CL_EXPLICIT_CONSTRUCTORS
212 #endif // #if defined(CL_USE_DEPRECATED_OPENCL_1_1_APIS)
213

215 // in case they are not pre-defined

217 #define CL_EXT_PREFIX__VERSION_1_1_DEPRECATED
218 #endif // #if !defined(CL_EXT_PREFIX__VERSION_1_1_DEPRECATED)
219 #if !defined(CL_EXT_SUFFIX__VERSION_1_1_DEPRECATED)
220 #define CL_EXT_SUFFIX__VERSION_1_1_DEPRECATED
221 #endif // #if !defined(CL_EXT_PREFIX__VERSION_1_1_DEPRECATED)

260 #if defined(CL_USE_DEPRECATED_OPENCL_1_1_APIS) || (defined(CL_VERSION_1_1) && !defined(CL_VERSION_1_2))
261 #define __INIT_CL_EXT_FCN_PTR(name) \
262  if(!pfn_##name) { \
263  pfn_##name = (PFN_##name) \
264  clGetExtensionFunctionAddress(#name); \
265  if(!pfn_##name) { \
266  } \
267  }
268 #endif // #if defined(CL_VERSION_1_1)
269 
270 #if defined(CL_VERSION_1_2)
271 #define __INIT_CL_EXT_FCN_PTR_PLATFORM(platform, name) \
272  if(!pfn_##name) { \
273  pfn_##name = (PFN_##name) \
274  clGetExtensionFunctionAddressForPlatform(platform, #name); \
275  if(!pfn_##name) { \
276  } \
277  }
278 #endif // #if defined(CL_VERSION_1_1)

287 #if defined(__CL_ENABLE_EXCEPTIONS)
288 
292 class Error : public std::exception
293 {
294 private:
295  cl_int err_;
296  const char * errStr_;
297 public:
307  Error(cl_int err, const char * errStr = NULL) : err_(err), errStr_(errStr)
308  {}
309 
310  ~Error() throw() {}
311 
316  virtual const char * what() const throw ()
317  {
318  if (errStr_ == NULL) {
319  return "empty";
320  }
321  else {
322  return errStr_;
323  }
324  }
325 
330  cl_int err(void) const { return err_; }
331 };
332 
333 #define __ERR_STR(x) #x
334 #else
335 #define __ERR_STR(x) NULL
336 #endif // __CL_ENABLE_EXCEPTIONS
337 
338 
339 namespace detail
340 {
341 #if defined(__CL_ENABLE_EXCEPTIONS)
342 static inline cl_int errHandler (
343  cl_int err,
344  const char * errStr = NULL)
345 {
346  if (err != CL_SUCCESS) {
347  throw Error(err, errStr);
348  }
349  return err;
350 }
351 #else
352 static inline cl_int errHandler (cl_int err, const char * errStr = NULL)
353 {
354  (void) errStr; // suppress unused variable warning
355  return err;
356 }
357 #endif // __CL_ENABLE_EXCEPTIONS
358 }
359

365 #define __GET_PLATFORM_INFO_ERR __ERR_STR(clGetPlatformInfo)
366 #define __GET_DEVICE_IDS_ERR __ERR_STR(clGetDeviceIDs)

407 #define __SET_KERNEL_ARGS_ERR __ERR_STR(clSetKernelArg)
408 #define __CREATE_PROGRAM_WITH_SOURCE_ERR __ERR_STR(clCreateProgramWithSource)
409 #define __CREATE_PROGRAM_WITH_BINARY_ERR __ERR_STR(clCreateProgramWithBinary)
410 #if defined(CL_VERSION_1_2)

412 #endif // #if defined(CL_VERSION_1_2)
413 #define __BUILD_PROGRAM_ERR __ERR_STR(clBuildProgram)

417 #endif // #if defined(CL_VERSION_1_2)
418 #define __CREATE_KERNELS_IN_PROGRAM_ERR __ERR_STR(clCreateKernelsInProgram)

420 #define __CREATE_COMMAND_QUEUE_ERR __ERR_STR(clCreateCommandQueue)
421 #define __SET_COMMAND_QUEUE_PROPERTY_ERR __ERR_STR(clSetCommandQueueProperty)
422 #define __ENQUEUE_READ_BUFFER_ERR __ERR_STR(clEnqueueReadBuffer)
423 #define __ENQUEUE_READ_BUFFER_RECT_ERR __ERR_STR(clEnqueueReadBufferRect)
424 #define __ENQUEUE_WRITE_BUFFER_ERR __ERR_STR(clEnqueueWriteBuffer)
425 #define __ENQUEUE_WRITE_BUFFER_RECT_ERR __ERR_STR(clEnqueueWriteBufferRect)
426 #define __ENQEUE_COPY_BUFFER_ERR __ERR_STR(clEnqueueCopyBuffer)
427 #define __ENQEUE_COPY_BUFFER_RECT_ERR __ERR_STR(clEnqueueCopyBufferRect)
428 #define __ENQUEUE_FILL_BUFFER_ERR __ERR_STR(clEnqueueFillBuffer)
429 #define __ENQUEUE_READ_IMAGE_ERR __ERR_STR(clEnqueueReadImage)
430 #define __ENQUEUE_WRITE_IMAGE_ERR __ERR_STR(clEnqueueWriteImage)
431 #define __ENQUEUE_COPY_IMAGE_ERR __ERR_STR(clEnqueueCopyImage)
432 #define __ENQUEUE_FILL_IMAGE_ERR __ERR_STR(clEnqueueFillImage)
433 #define __ENQUEUE_COPY_IMAGE_TO_BUFFER_ERR __ERR_STR(clEnqueueCopyImageToBuffer)
434 #define __ENQUEUE_COPY_BUFFER_TO_IMAGE_ERR __ERR_STR(clEnqueueCopyBufferToImage)
435 #define __ENQUEUE_MAP_BUFFER_ERR __ERR_STR(clEnqueueMapBuffer)
436 #define __ENQUEUE_MAP_IMAGE_ERR __ERR_STR(clEnqueueMapImage)
437 #define __ENQUEUE_UNMAP_MEM_OBJECT_ERR __ERR_STR(clEnqueueUnMapMemObject)
438 #define __ENQUEUE_NDRANGE_KERNEL_ERR __ERR_STR(clEnqueueNDRangeKernel)
439 #define __ENQUEUE_TASK_ERR __ERR_STR(clEnqueueTask)
440 #define __ENQUEUE_NATIVE_KERNEL __ERR_STR(clEnqueueNativeKernel)

489 #if !defined(__USE_DEV_STRING) && !defined(__NO_STD_STRING)
490 typedef std::string STRING_CLASS;
491 #elif !defined(__USE_DEV_STRING)
492 
501 class CL_EXT_PREFIX__VERSION_1_1_DEPRECATED string CL_EXT_SUFFIX__VERSION_1_1_DEPRECATED
502 {
503 private:
504  ::size_t size_;
505  char * str_;
506 public:
508  string(void) : size_(0), str_(NULL)
509  {
510  }
511 
523  string(const char * str, ::size_t size) :
524  size_(size),
525  str_(NULL)
526  {
527  if( size > 0 ) {
528  str_ = new char[size_+1];
529  if (str_ != NULL) {
530  memcpy(str_, str, size_ * sizeof(char));
531  str_[size_] = '\0';
532  }
533  else {
534  size_ = 0;
535  }
536  }
537  }
538 
544  string(const char * str) :
545  size_(0),
546  str_(NULL)
547  {
548  if( str ) {
549  size_= ::strlen(str);
550  }
551  if( size_ > 0 ) {
552  str_ = new char[size_ + 1];
553  if (str_ != NULL) {
554  memcpy(str_, str, (size_ + 1) * sizeof(char));
555  }
556  }
557  }
558 
559  void resize( ::size_t n )
560  {
561  if( size_ == n ) {
562  return;
563  }
564  if (n == 0) {
565  if( str_ ) {
566  delete [] str_;
567  }
568  str_ = NULL;
569  size_ = 0;
570  }
571  else {
572  char *newString = new char[n + 1];
573  int copySize = n;
574  if( size_ < n ) {
575  copySize = size_;
576  }
577  size_ = n;
578 
579  if(str_) {
580  memcpy(newString, str_, (copySize + 1) * sizeof(char));
581  }
582  if( copySize < size_ ) {
583  memset(newString + copySize, 0, size_ - copySize);
584  }
585  newString[size_] = '\0';
586 
587  delete [] str_;
588  str_ = newString;
589  }
590  }
591 
592  const char& operator[] ( ::size_t pos ) const
593  {
594  return str_[pos];
595  }
596 
597  char& operator[] ( ::size_t pos )
598  {
599  return str_[pos];
600  }
601 
608  string& operator=(const string& rhs)
609  {
610  if (this == &rhs) {
611  return *this;
612  }
613 
614  if( str_ != NULL ) {
615  delete [] str_;
616  str_ = NULL;
617  size_ = 0;
618  }
619 
620  if (rhs.size_ == 0 || rhs.str_ == NULL) {
621  str_ = NULL;
622  size_ = 0;
623  }
624  else {
625  str_ = new char[rhs.size_ + 1];
626  size_ = rhs.size_;
627 
628  if (str_ != NULL) {
629  memcpy(str_, rhs.str_, (size_ + 1) * sizeof(char));
630  }
631  else {
632  size_ = 0;
633  }
634  }
635 
636  return *this;
637  }
638 
643  string(const string& rhs) :
644  size_(0),
645  str_(NULL)
646  {
647  *this = rhs;
648  }
649 
651  ~string()
652  {
653  delete[] str_;
654  str_ = NULL;
655  }
656 
658  ::size_t size(void) const { return size_; }
659 
661  ::size_t length(void) const { return size(); }
662 
666  const char * c_str(void) const { return (str_) ? str_ : "";}
667 };
668 typedef cl::string STRING_CLASS;
669 #endif // #elif !defined(__USE_DEV_STRING)
670 
671 #if !defined(__USE_DEV_VECTOR) && !defined(__NO_STD_VECTOR)
672 #define VECTOR_CLASS std::vector
673 #elif !defined(__USE_DEV_VECTOR)
674 #define VECTOR_CLASS cl::vector
675 
676 #if !defined(__MAX_DEFAULT_VECTOR_SIZE)
677 #define __MAX_DEFAULT_VECTOR_SIZE 10
678 #endif
679 
702 template <typename T, unsigned int N = __MAX_DEFAULT_VECTOR_SIZE>
703 class CL_EXT_PREFIX__VERSION_1_1_DEPRECATED vector CL_EXT_SUFFIX__VERSION_1_1_DEPRECATED
704 {
705 private:
706  T data_[N];
707  unsigned int size_;
708 
709 public:
711  vector() :
712  size_(static_cast<unsigned int>(0))
713  {}
714 
716  ~vector()
717  {
718  clear();
719  }
720 
722  unsigned int size(void) const
723  {
724  return size_;
725  }
726 
732  void clear()
733  {
734  while(!empty()) {
735  pop_back();
736  }
737  }
738 
743  void push_back (const T& x)
744  {
745  if (size() < N) {
746  new (&data_[size_]) T(x);
747  size_++;
748  } else {
749  detail::errHandler(CL_MEM_OBJECT_ALLOCATION_FAILURE, __VECTOR_CAPACITY_ERR);
750  }
751  }
752 
757  void pop_back(void)
758  {
759  if (size_ != 0) {
760  --size_;
761  data_[size_].~T();
762  } else {
763  detail::errHandler(CL_MEM_OBJECT_ALLOCATION_FAILURE, __VECTOR_CAPACITY_ERR);
764  }
765  }
766 
771  vector(const vector<T, N>& vec) :
772  size_(vec.size_)
773  {
774  if (size_ != 0) {
775  assign(vec.begin(), vec.end());
776  }
777  }
778 
785  vector(unsigned int size, const T& val = T()) :
786  size_(0)
787  {
788  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < size; i++) {
789  push_back(val);
790  }
791  }
792 
800  vector<T, N>& operator=(const vector<T, N>& rhs)
801  {
802  if (this == &rhs) {
803  return *this;
804  }
805 
806  if (rhs.size_ != 0) {
807  assign(rhs.begin(), rhs.end());
808  } else {
809  clear();
810  }
811 
812  return *this;
813  }
814 
819  bool operator==(vector<T,N> &vec)
820  {
821  if (size() != vec.size()) {
822  return false;
823  }
824 
825  for( unsigned int i = 0; i < size(); ++i ) {
826  if( operator[](i) != vec[i] ) {
827  return false;
828  }
829  }
830  return true;
831  }
832 
834  operator T* () { return data_; }
835 
837  operator const T* () const { return data_; }
838 
840  bool empty (void) const
841  {
842  return size_==0;
843  }
844 
846  unsigned int max_size (void) const
847  {
848  return N;
849  }
850 
852  unsigned int capacity () const
853  {
854  return N;
855  }
856 
863  T& operator[](int index)
864  {
865  return data_[index];
866  }
867 
875  const T& operator[](int index) const
876  {
877  return data_[index];
878  }
879 
888  template<class I>
889  void assign(I start, I end)
890  {
891  clear();
892  while(start != end) {
893  push_back(*start);
894  start++;
895  }
896  }
897 
901  class iterator
902  {
903  private:
904  const vector<T,N> *vec_;
905  int index_;
906 
912  iterator (const vector<T,N> &vec, int index) :
913  vec_(&vec)
914  {
915  if( !vec.empty() ) {
916  index_ = index;
917  } else {
918  index_ = -1;
919  }
920  }
921 
922  public:
923  iterator(void) :
924  index_(-1),
925  vec_(NULL)
926  {
927  }
928 
929  iterator(const iterator& rhs) :
930  vec_(rhs.vec_),
931  index_(rhs.index_)
932  {
933  }
934 
935  ~iterator(void) {}
936 
937  static iterator begin(const cl::vector<T,N> &vec)
938  {
939  iterator i(vec, 0);
940 
941  return i;
942  }
943 
944  static iterator end(const cl::vector<T,N> &vec)
945  {
946  iterator i(vec, vec.size());
947 
948  return i;
949  }
950 
951  bool operator==(iterator i)
952  {
953  return ((vec_ == i.vec_) &&
954  (index_ == i.index_));
955  }
956 
957  bool operator!=(iterator i)
958  {
959  return (!(*this==i));
960  }
961 
962  iterator& operator++()
963  {
964  ++index_;
965  return *this;
966  }
967 
968  iterator operator++(int)
969  {
970  iterator retVal(*this);
971  ++index_;
972  return retVal;
973  }
974 
975  iterator& operator--()
976  {
977  --index_;
978  return *this;
979  }
980 
981  iterator operator--(int)
982  {
983  iterator retVal(*this);
984  --index_;
985  return retVal;
986  }
987 
988  const T& operator *() const
989  {
990  return (*vec_)[index_];
991  }
992  };
993 
994  iterator begin(void)
995  {
996  return iterator::begin(*this);
997  }
998 
999  iterator begin(void) const
1000  {
1001  return iterator::begin(*this);
1002  }
1003 
1004  iterator end(void)
1005  {
1006  return iterator::end(*this);
1007  }
1008 
1009  iterator end(void) const
1010  {
1011  return iterator::end(*this);
1012  }
1013 
1014  T& front(void)
1015  {
1016  return data_[0];
1017  }
1018 
1019  T& back(void)
1020  {
1021  return data_[size_];
1022  }
1023 
1024  const T& front(void) const
1025  {
1026  return data_[0];
1027  }
1028 
1029  const T& back(void) const
1030  {
1031  return data_[size_-1];
1032  }
1033 };
1034 #endif // #if !defined(__USE_DEV_VECTOR) && !defined(__NO_STD_VECTOR)
1035 
1036 
1037 
1038 
1039 
1040 namespace detail {
1041 #define __DEFAULT_NOT_INITIALIZED 1
1042 #define __DEFAULT_BEING_INITIALIZED 2
1043 #define __DEFAULT_INITIALIZED 4
1044 
1045  /*
1046  * Compare and exchange primitives are needed for handling of defaults
1047  */
1048  inline int compare_exchange(volatile int * dest, int exchange, int comparand)
1049  {
1050 #ifdef _WIN32
1051  return (int)(InterlockedCompareExchange(
1052  (volatile long*)dest,
1053  (long)exchange,
1054  (long)comparand));
1055 #elif defined(__APPLE__) || defined(__MACOSX)
1056  return OSAtomicOr32Orig((uint32_t)exchange, (volatile uint32_t*)dest);
1057 #else // !_WIN32 || defined(__APPLE__) || defined(__MACOSX)
1058  return (__sync_val_compare_and_swap(
1059  dest,
1060  comparand,
1061  exchange));
1062 #endif // !_WIN32
1063  }
1064 
1065  inline void fence() { _mm_mfence(); }
1066 }; // namespace detail
1067 
1068 
1073 template <int N>
1074 class size_t
1075 {
1076 private:
1077  ::size_t data_[N];
1078 
1079 public:
1081  size_t()
1082  {
1083  for( int i = 0; i < N; ++i ) {
1084  data_[i] = 0;
1085  }
1086  }
1087 
1088  ::size_t& operator[](int index)
1089  {
1090  return data_[index];
1091  }
1092 
1093  const ::size_t& operator[](int index) const
1094  {
1095  return data_[index];
1096  }
1097 
1099  operator ::size_t* () { return data_; }
1100 
1102  operator const ::size_t* () const { return data_; }
1103 };
1104 
1105 namespace detail {
1106 
1107 // Generic getInfoHelper. The final parameter is used to guide overload
1108 // resolution: the actual parameter passed is an int, which makes this
1109 // a worse conversion sequence than a specialization that declares the
1110 // parameter as an int.
1111 template<typename Functor, typename T>
1112 inline cl_int getInfoHelper(Functor f, cl_uint name, T* param, long)
1113 {
1114  return f(name, sizeof(T), param, NULL);
1115 }
1116 
1117 // Specialized getInfoHelper for VECTOR_CLASS params
1118 template <typename Func, typename T>
1119 inline cl_int getInfoHelper(Func f, cl_uint name, VECTOR_CLASS<T>* param, long)
1120 {
1121  ::size_t required;
1122  cl_int err = f(name, 0, NULL, &required);
1123  if (err != CL_SUCCESS) {
1124  return err;
1125  }
1126 
1127  T* value = (T*) alloca(required);
1128  err = f(name, required, value, NULL);
1129  if (err != CL_SUCCESS) {
1130  return err;
1131  }
1132 
1133  param->assign(&value[0], &value[required/sizeof(T)]);
1134  return CL_SUCCESS;
1135 }
1136 
1137 /* Specialization for reference-counted types. This depends on the
1138  * existence of Wrapper<T>::cl_type, and none of the other types having the
1139  * cl_type member. Note that simplify specifying the parameter as Wrapper<T>
1140  * does not work, because when using a derived type (e.g. Context) the generic
1141  * template will provide a better match.
1142  */
1143 template <typename Func, typename T>
1144 inline cl_int getInfoHelper(Func f, cl_uint name, VECTOR_CLASS<T>* param, int, typename T::cl_type = 0)
1145 {
1146  ::size_t required;
1147  cl_int err = f(name, 0, NULL, &required);
1148  if (err != CL_SUCCESS) {
1149  return err;
1150  }
1151 
1152  typename T::cl_type * value = (typename T::cl_type *) alloca(required);
1153  err = f(name, required, value, NULL);
1154  if (err != CL_SUCCESS) {
1155  return err;
1156  }
1157 
1158  ::size_t elements = required / sizeof(typename T::cl_type);
1159  param->assign(&value[0], &value[elements]);
1160  for (::size_t i = 0; i < elements; i++)
1161  {
1162  if (value[i] != NULL)
1163  {
1164  err = (*param)[i].retain();
1165  if (err != CL_SUCCESS) {
1166  return err;
1167  }
1168  }
1169  }
1170  return CL_SUCCESS;
1171 }
1172 
1173 // Specialized for getInfo<CL_PROGRAM_BINARIES>
1174 template <typename Func>
1175 inline cl_int getInfoHelper(Func f, cl_uint name, VECTOR_CLASS<char *>* param, int)
1176 {
1177  cl_int err = f(name, param->size() * sizeof(char *), &(*param)[0], NULL);
1178 
1179  if (err != CL_SUCCESS) {
1180  return err;
1181  }
1182 
1183  return CL_SUCCESS;
1184 }
1185 
1186 // Specialized GetInfoHelper for STRING_CLASS params
1187 template <typename Func>
1188 inline cl_int getInfoHelper(Func f, cl_uint name, STRING_CLASS* param, long)
1189 {
1190  ::size_t required;
1191  cl_int err = f(name, 0, NULL, &required);
1192  if (err != CL_SUCCESS) {
1193  return err;
1194  }
1195 
1196  char* value = (char*) alloca(required);
1197  err = f(name, required, value, NULL);
1198  if (err != CL_SUCCESS) {
1199  return err;
1200  }
1201 
1202  *param = value;
1203  return CL_SUCCESS;
1204 }
1205 
1206 // Specialized GetInfoHelper for cl::size_t params
1207 template <typename Func, ::size_t N>
1208 inline cl_int getInfoHelper(Func f, cl_uint name, size_t<N>* param, long)
1209 {
1210  ::size_t required;
1211  cl_int err = f(name, 0, NULL, &required);
1212  if (err != CL_SUCCESS) {
1213  return err;
1214  }
1215 
1216  ::size_t* value = (::size_t*) alloca(required);
1217  err = f(name, required, value, NULL);
1218  if (err != CL_SUCCESS) {
1219  return err;
1220  }
1221 
1222  for(int i = 0; i < N; ++i) {
1223  (*param)[i] = value[i];
1224  }
1225 
1226  return CL_SUCCESS;
1227 }
1228 
1229 template<typename T> struct ReferenceHandler;
1230 
1231 /* Specialization for reference-counted types. This depends on the
1232  * existence of Wrapper<T>::cl_type, and none of the other types having the
1233  * cl_type member. Note that simplify specifying the parameter as Wrapper<T>
1234  * does not work, because when using a derived type (e.g. Context) the generic
1235  * template will provide a better match.
1236  */
1237 template<typename Func, typename T>
1238 inline cl_int getInfoHelper(Func f, cl_uint name, T* param, int, typename T::cl_type = 0)
1239 {
1240  typename T::cl_type value;
1241  cl_int err = f(name, sizeof(value), &value, NULL);
1242  if (err != CL_SUCCESS) {
1243  return err;
1244  }
1245  *param = value;
1246  if (value != NULL)
1247  {
1248  err = param->retain();
1249  if (err != CL_SUCCESS) {
1250  return err;
1251  }
1252  }
1253  return CL_SUCCESS;
1254 }
1255

1430  F(cl_device_info, CL_DEVICE_PARENT_DEVICE_EXT, cl_device_id) \
1431  F(cl_device_info, CL_DEVICE_PARTITION_TYPES_EXT, VECTOR_CLASS<cl_device_partition_property_ext>) \

1435 #endif // USE_CL_DEVICE_FISSION
1436 
1437 template <typename enum_type, cl_int Name>
1438 struct param_traits {};
1439 
1440 #define __CL_DECLARE_PARAM_TRAITS(token, param_name, T) \
1441 struct token; \
1442 template<> \
1443 struct param_traits<detail:: token,param_name> \
1444 { \
1445  enum { value = param_name }; \
1446  typedef T param_type; \
1447 };
1448 
1449 __PARAM_NAME_INFO_1_0(__CL_DECLARE_PARAM_TRAITS)
1450 #if defined(CL_VERSION_1_1)
1451 __PARAM_NAME_INFO_1_1(__CL_DECLARE_PARAM_TRAITS)
1452 #endif // CL_VERSION_1_1
1453 #if defined(CL_VERSION_1_2)
1454 __PARAM_NAME_INFO_1_2(__CL_DECLARE_PARAM_TRAITS)
1455 #endif // CL_VERSION_1_1
1456 
1457 #if defined(USE_CL_DEVICE_FISSION)
1458 __PARAM_NAME_DEVICE_FISSION(__CL_DECLARE_PARAM_TRAITS);
1459 #endif // USE_CL_DEVICE_FISSION
1460 
1461 #ifdef CL_PLATFORM_ICD_SUFFIX_KHR
1462 __CL_DECLARE_PARAM_TRAITS(cl_platform_info, CL_PLATFORM_ICD_SUFFIX_KHR, STRING_CLASS)
1463 #endif
1464 
1465 #ifdef CL_DEVICE_PROFILING_TIMER_OFFSET_AMD
1466 __CL_DECLARE_PARAM_TRAITS(cl_device_info, CL_DEVICE_PROFILING_TIMER_OFFSET_AMD, cl_ulong)
1467 #endif

1471 #endif

1474 #endif
1475 #ifdef CL_DEVICE_SIMD_WIDTH_AMD
1476 __CL_DECLARE_PARAM_TRAITS(cl_device_info, CL_DEVICE_SIMD_WIDTH_AMD, cl_uint)
1477 #endif
1478 #ifdef CL_DEVICE_SIMD_INSTRUCTION_WIDTH_AMD

1480 #endif

1483 #endif

1492 #endif

1495 #endif

1502 #endif

1517 #endif

1521 
1522 // Convenience functions
1523 
1524 template <typename Func, typename T>
1525 inline cl_int
1526 getInfo(Func f, cl_uint name, T* param)
1527 {
1528  return getInfoHelper(f, name, param, 0);
1529 }
1530 
1531 template <typename Func, typename Arg0>
1532 struct GetInfoFunctor0
1533 {
1534  Func f_; const Arg0& arg0_;
1535  cl_int operator ()(
1536  cl_uint param, ::size_t size, void* value, ::size_t* size_ret)
1537  { return f_(arg0_, param, size, value, size_ret); }
1538 };
1539 
1540 template <typename Func, typename Arg0, typename Arg1>
1541 struct GetInfoFunctor1
1542 {
1543  Func f_; const Arg0& arg0_; const Arg1& arg1_;
1544  cl_int operator ()(
1545  cl_uint param, ::size_t size, void* value, ::size_t* size_ret)
1546  { return f_(arg0_, arg1_, param, size, value, size_ret); }
1547 };
1548 
1549 template <typename Func, typename Arg0, typename T>
1550 inline cl_int
1551 getInfo(Func f, const Arg0& arg0, cl_uint name, T* param)
1552 {
1553  GetInfoFunctor0<Func, Arg0> f0 = { f, arg0 };
1554  return getInfoHelper(f0, name, param, 0);
1555 }
1556 
1557 template <typename Func, typename Arg0, typename Arg1, typename T>
1558 inline cl_int
1559 getInfo(Func f, const Arg0& arg0, const Arg1& arg1, cl_uint name, T* param)
1560 {
1561  GetInfoFunctor1<Func, Arg0, Arg1> f0 = { f, arg0, arg1 };
1562  return getInfoHelper(f0, name, param, 0);
1563 }
1564 
1565 template<typename T>
1566 struct ReferenceHandler
1567 { };
1568 
1569 #if defined(CL_VERSION_1_2)
1570 
1573 template <>
1574 struct ReferenceHandler<cl_device_id>
1575 {
1585  static cl_int retain(cl_device_id device)
1586  { return ::clRetainDevice(device); }
1596  static cl_int release(cl_device_id device)
1597  { return ::clReleaseDevice(device); }
1598 };
1599 #else // #if defined(CL_VERSION_1_2)
1600 
1603 template <>
1604 struct ReferenceHandler<cl_device_id>
1605 {
1606  // cl_device_id does not have retain().
1607  static cl_int retain(cl_device_id)
1608  { return CL_SUCCESS; }
1609  // cl_device_id does not have release().
1610  static cl_int release(cl_device_id)
1611  { return CL_SUCCESS; }
1612 };
1613 #endif // #if defined(CL_VERSION_1_2)
1614 
1615 template <>
1616 struct ReferenceHandler<cl_platform_id>
1617 {
1618  // cl_platform_id does not have retain().
1619  static cl_int retain(cl_platform_id)
1620  { return CL_SUCCESS; }
1621  // cl_platform_id does not have release().
1622  static cl_int release(cl_platform_id)
1623  { return CL_SUCCESS; }
1624 };
1625 
1626 template <>
1627 struct ReferenceHandler<cl_context>
1628 {
1629  static cl_int retain(cl_context context)
1630  { return ::clRetainContext(context); }
1631  static cl_int release(cl_context context)
1632  { return ::clReleaseContext(context); }
1633 };
1634 
1635 template <>
1636 struct ReferenceHandler<cl_command_queue>
1637 {
1638  static cl_int retain(cl_command_queue queue)
1639  { return ::clRetainCommandQueue(queue); }
1640  static cl_int release(cl_command_queue queue)
1641  { return ::clReleaseCommandQueue(queue); }
1642 };
1643

1645 struct ReferenceHandler<cl_mem>
1646 {
1647  static cl_int retain(cl_mem memory)
1648  { return ::clRetainMemObject(memory); }
1649  static cl_int release(cl_mem memory)
1650  { return ::clReleaseMemObject(memory); }
1651 };
1652

1654 struct ReferenceHandler<cl_sampler>
1655 {
1656  static cl_int retain(cl_sampler sampler)
1657  { return ::clRetainSampler(sampler); }
1658  static cl_int release(cl_sampler sampler)
1659  { return ::clReleaseSampler(sampler); }
1660 };
1661 
1662 template <>
1663 struct ReferenceHandler<cl_program>
1664 {
1665  static cl_int retain(cl_program program)
1666  { return ::clRetainProgram(program); }
1667  static cl_int release(cl_program program)
1668  { return ::clReleaseProgram(program); }
1669 };
1670 
1671 template <>
1672 struct ReferenceHandler<cl_kernel>
1673 {
1674  static cl_int retain(cl_kernel kernel)
1675  { return ::clRetainKernel(kernel); }
1676  static cl_int release(cl_kernel kernel)
1677  { return ::clReleaseKernel(kernel); }
1678 };
1679 
1680 template <>
1681 struct ReferenceHandler<cl_event>
1682 {
1683  static cl_int retain(cl_event event)
1684  { return ::clRetainEvent(event); }
1685  static cl_int release(cl_event event)
1686  { return ::clReleaseEvent(event); }
1687 };
1688 
1689 
1690 // Extracts version number with major in the upper 16 bits, minor in the lower 16
1691 static cl_uint getVersion(const char *versionInfo)
1692 {
1693  int highVersion = 0;
1694  int lowVersion = 0;
1695  int index = 7;
1696  while(versionInfo[index] != '.' ) {
1697  highVersion *= 10;
1698  highVersion += versionInfo[index]-'0';
1699  ++index;
1700  }
1701  ++index;
1702  while(versionInfo[index] != ' ' ) {
1703  lowVersion *= 10;
1704  lowVersion += versionInfo[index]-'0';
1705  ++index;
1706  }
1707  return (highVersion << 16) | lowVersion;
1708 }
1709 
1710 static cl_uint getPlatformVersion(cl_platform_id platform)
1711 {
1712  ::size_t size = 0;
1713  clGetPlatformInfo(platform, CL_PLATFORM_VERSION, 0, NULL, &size);
1714  char *versionInfo = (char *) alloca(size);
1715  clGetPlatformInfo(platform, CL_PLATFORM_VERSION, size, &versionInfo[0], &size);
1716  return getVersion(versionInfo);
1717 }
1718 
1719 static cl_uint getDevicePlatformVersion(cl_device_id device)
1720 {
1721  cl_platform_id platform;
1722  clGetDeviceInfo(device, CL_DEVICE_PLATFORM, sizeof(platform), &platform, NULL);
1723  return getPlatformVersion(platform);
1724 }
1725 
1726 #if defined(CL_VERSION_1_2) && defined(CL_USE_DEPRECATED_OPENCL_1_1_APIS)
1727 static cl_uint getContextPlatformVersion(cl_context context)
1728 {
1729  // The platform cannot be queried directly, so we first have to grab a
1730  // device and obtain its context
1731  ::size_t size = 0;
1732  clGetContextInfo(context, CL_CONTEXT_DEVICES, 0, NULL, &size);
1733  if (size == 0)
1734  return 0;
1735  cl_device_id *devices = (cl_device_id *) alloca(size);
1736  clGetContextInfo(context, CL_CONTEXT_DEVICES, size, devices, NULL);
1737  return getDevicePlatformVersion(devices[0]);
1738 }
1739 #endif // #if defined(CL_VERSION_1_2) && defined(CL_USE_DEPRECATED_OPENCL_1_1_APIS)
1740 
1741 template <typename T>
1742 class Wrapper
1743 {
1744 public:
1745  typedef T cl_type;
1746 
1747 protected:
1748  cl_type object_;
1749 
1750 public:
1751  Wrapper() : object_(NULL) { }
1752 
1753  Wrapper(const cl_type &obj) : object_(obj) { }
1754 
1755  ~Wrapper()
1756  {
1757  if (object_ != NULL) { release(); }
1758  }
1759 
1760  Wrapper(const Wrapper<cl_type>& rhs)
1761  {
1762  object_ = rhs.object_;
1763  if (object_ != NULL) { detail::errHandler(retain(), __RETAIN_ERR); }
1764  }
1765 
1766  Wrapper<cl_type>& operator = (const Wrapper<cl_type>& rhs)
1767  {
1768  if (object_ != NULL) { detail::errHandler(release(), __RELEASE_ERR); }
1769  object_ = rhs.object_;
1770  if (object_ != NULL) { detail::errHandler(retain(), __RETAIN_ERR); }
1771  return *this;
1772  }
1773 
1774  Wrapper<cl_type>& operator = (const cl_type &rhs)
1775  {
1776  if (object_ != NULL) { detail::errHandler(release(), __RELEASE_ERR); }
1777  object_ = rhs;
1778  return *this;
1779  }
1780 
1781  cl_type operator ()() const { return object_; }
1782 
1783  cl_type& operator ()() { return object_; }
1784 
1785 protected:
1786  template<typename Func, typename U>
1787  friend inline cl_int getInfoHelper(Func, cl_uint, U*, int, typename U::cl_type);
1788 
1789  cl_int retain() const
1790  {
1791  return ReferenceHandler<cl_type>::retain(object_);
1792  }
1793 
1794  cl_int release() const
1795  {
1796  return ReferenceHandler<cl_type>::release(object_);
1797  }
1798 };
1799 
1800 template <>
1801 class Wrapper<cl_device_id>
1802 {
1803 public:
1804  typedef cl_device_id cl_type;
1805 
1806 protected:
1807  cl_type object_;
1808  bool referenceCountable_;
1809 
1810  static bool isReferenceCountable(cl_device_id device)
1811  {
1812  bool retVal = false;
1813  if (device != NULL) {
1814  int version = getDevicePlatformVersion(device);
1815  if(version > ((1 << 16) + 1)) {
1816  retVal = true;
1817  }
1818  }
1819  return retVal;
1820  }
1821 
1822 public:
1823  Wrapper() : object_(NULL), referenceCountable_(false)
1824  {
1825  }
1826 
1827  Wrapper(const cl_type &obj) : object_(obj), referenceCountable_(false)
1828  {
1829  referenceCountable_ = isReferenceCountable(obj);
1830  }
1831 
1832  ~Wrapper()
1833  {
1834  if (object_ != NULL) { release(); }
1835  }
1836 
1837  Wrapper(const Wrapper<cl_type>& rhs)
1838  {
1839  object_ = rhs.object_;
1840  referenceCountable_ = isReferenceCountable(object_);
1841  if (object_ != NULL) { detail::errHandler(retain(), __RETAIN_ERR); }
1842  }
1843 
1844  Wrapper<cl_type>& operator = (const Wrapper<cl_type>& rhs)
1845  {
1846  if (object_ != NULL) { detail::errHandler(release(), __RELEASE_ERR); }
1847  object_ = rhs.object_;
1848  referenceCountable_ = rhs.referenceCountable_;
1849  if (object_ != NULL) { detail::errHandler(retain(), __RETAIN_ERR); }
1850  return *this;
1851  }
1852 
1853  Wrapper<cl_type>& operator = (const cl_type &rhs)
1854  {
1855  if (object_ != NULL) { detail::errHandler(release(), __RELEASE_ERR); }
1856  object_ = rhs;
1857  referenceCountable_ = isReferenceCountable(object_);
1858  return *this;
1859  }
1860 
1861  cl_type operator ()() const { return object_; }
1862 
1863  cl_type& operator ()() { return object_; }
1864 
1865 protected:
1866  template<typename Func, typename U>
1867  friend inline cl_int getInfoHelper(Func, cl_uint, U*, int, typename U::cl_type);
1868 
1869  template<typename Func, typename U>
1870  friend inline cl_int getInfoHelper(Func, cl_uint, VECTOR_CLASS<U>*, int, typename U::cl_type);
1871 
1872  cl_int retain() const
1873  {
1874  if( referenceCountable_ ) {
1875  return ReferenceHandler<cl_type>::retain(object_);
1876  }
1877  else {
1878  return CL_SUCCESS;
1879  }
1880  }
1881 
1882  cl_int release() const
1883  {
1884  if( referenceCountable_ ) {
1885  return ReferenceHandler<cl_type>::release(object_);
1886  }
1887  else {
1888  return CL_SUCCESS;
1889  }
1890  }
1891 };
1892 
1893 } // namespace detail
1895 
1901 struct ImageFormat : public cl_image_format
1902 {
1904  ImageFormat(){}
1905 
1907  ImageFormat(cl_channel_order order, cl_channel_type type)
1908  {
1909  image_channel_order = order;
1910  image_channel_data_type = type;
1911  }
1912 
1914  ImageFormat& operator = (const ImageFormat& rhs)
1915  {
1916  if (this != &rhs) {
1917  this->image_channel_data_type = rhs.image_channel_data_type;
1918  this->image_channel_order = rhs.image_channel_order;
1919  }
1920  return *this;
1921  }
1922 };
1923 
1931 class Device : public detail::Wrapper<cl_device_id>
1932 {
1933 public:
1935  Device() : detail::Wrapper<cl_type>() { }
1936 
1941  Device(const Device& device) : detail::Wrapper<cl_type>(device) { }
1942 
1947  Device(const cl_device_id &device) : detail::Wrapper<cl_type>(device) { }
1948 
1953  static Device getDefault(cl_int * err = NULL);
1954 
1959  Device& operator = (const Device& rhs)
1960  {
1961  if (this != &rhs) {
1962  detail::Wrapper<cl_type>::operator=(rhs);
1963  }
1964  return *this;
1965  }
1966 
1971  Device& operator = (const cl_device_id& rhs)
1972  {
1973  detail::Wrapper<cl_type>::operator=(rhs);
1974  return *this;
1975  }
1976 
1978  template <typename T>
1979  cl_int getInfo(cl_device_info name, T* param) const
1980  {
1981  return detail::errHandler(
1982  detail::getInfo(&::clGetDeviceInfo, object_, name, param),
1983  __GET_DEVICE_INFO_ERR);
1984  }
1985 
1987  template <cl_int name> typename
1988  detail::param_traits<detail::cl_device_info, name>::param_type
1989  getInfo(cl_int* err = NULL) const
1990  {
1991  typename detail::param_traits<
1992  detail::cl_device_info, name>::param_type param;
1993  cl_int result = getInfo(name, &param);
1994  if (err != NULL) {
1995  *err = result;
1996  }
1997  return param;
1998  }
1999 
2003 #if defined(CL_VERSION_1_2)
2004  cl_int createSubDevices(
2006  const cl_device_partition_property * properties,
2007  VECTOR_CLASS<Device>* devices)
2008  {
2009  cl_uint n = 0;
2010  cl_int err = clCreateSubDevices(object_, properties, 0, NULL, &n);
2011  if (err != CL_SUCCESS) {
2012  return detail::errHandler(err, __CREATE_SUB_DEVICES);
2013  }
2014 
2015  cl_device_id* ids = (cl_device_id*) alloca(n * sizeof(cl_device_id));
2016  err = clCreateSubDevices(object_, properties, n, ids, NULL);
2017  if (err != CL_SUCCESS) {
2018  return detail::errHandler(err, __CREATE_SUB_DEVICES);
2019  }
2020 
2021  devices->assign(&ids[0], &ids[n]);
2022  return CL_SUCCESS;
2023  }
2024 #endif // #if defined(CL_VERSION_1_2)
2025 
2029 #if defined(CL_VERSION_1_1)
2030 #if defined(USE_CL_DEVICE_FISSION)
2031  cl_int createSubDevices(
2032  const cl_device_partition_property_ext * properties,
2033  VECTOR_CLASS<Device>* devices)
2034  {
2035  typedef CL_API_ENTRY cl_int
2036  ( CL_API_CALL * PFN_clCreateSubDevicesEXT)(
2037  cl_device_id /*in_device*/,
2038  const cl_device_partition_property_ext * /* properties */,
2039  cl_uint /*num_entries*/,
2040  cl_device_id * /*out_devices*/,
2041  cl_uint * /*num_devices*/ ) CL_EXT_SUFFIX__VERSION_1_1;
2042 
2043  static PFN_clCreateSubDevicesEXT pfn_clCreateSubDevicesEXT = NULL;
2044  __INIT_CL_EXT_FCN_PTR(clCreateSubDevicesEXT);
2045 
2046  cl_uint n = 0;
2047  cl_int err = pfn_clCreateSubDevicesEXT(object_, properties, 0, NULL, &n);
2048  if (err != CL_SUCCESS) {
2049  return detail::errHandler(err, __CREATE_SUB_DEVICES);
2050  }
2051 
2052  cl_device_id* ids = (cl_device_id*) alloca(n * sizeof(cl_device_id));
2053  err = pfn_clCreateSubDevicesEXT(object_, properties, n, ids, NULL);
2054  if (err != CL_SUCCESS) {
2055  return detail::errHandler(err, __CREATE_SUB_DEVICES);
2056  }
2057 
2058  devices->assign(&ids[0], &ids[n]);
2059  return CL_SUCCESS;
2060  }
2061 #endif // #if defined(USE_CL_DEVICE_FISSION)
2062 #endif // #if defined(CL_VERSION_1_1)
2063 };
2064 
2072 class Platform : public detail::Wrapper<cl_platform_id>
2073 {
2074 public:
2076  Platform() : detail::Wrapper<cl_type>() { }
2077 
2082  Platform(const Platform& platform) : detail::Wrapper<cl_type>(platform) { }
2083 
2088  Platform(const cl_platform_id &platform) : detail::Wrapper<cl_type>(platform) { }
2089 
2094  Platform& operator = (const Platform& rhs)
2095  {
2096  if (this != &rhs) {
2097  detail::Wrapper<cl_type>::operator=(rhs);
2098  }
2099  return *this;
2100  }
2101 
2106  Platform& operator = (const cl_platform_id& rhs)
2107  {
2108  detail::Wrapper<cl_type>::operator=(rhs);
2109  return *this;
2110  }
2111 
2113  cl_int getInfo(cl_platform_info name, STRING_CLASS* param) const
2114  {
2115  return detail::errHandler(
2116  detail::getInfo(&::clGetPlatformInfo, object_, name, param),
2117  __GET_PLATFORM_INFO_ERR);
2118  }
2119 
2121  template <cl_int name> typename
2122  detail::param_traits<detail::cl_platform_info, name>::param_type
2123  getInfo(cl_int* err = NULL) const
2124  {
2125  typename detail::param_traits<
2126  detail::cl_platform_info, name>::param_type param;
2127  cl_int result = getInfo(name, &param);
2128  if (err != NULL) {
2129  *err = result;
2130  }
2131  return param;
2132  }
2133 
2138  cl_int getDevices(
2139  cl_device_type type,
2140  VECTOR_CLASS<Device>* devices) const
2141  {
2142  cl_uint n = 0;
2143  if( devices == NULL ) {
2144  return detail::errHandler(CL_INVALID_ARG_VALUE, __GET_DEVICE_IDS_ERR);
2145  }
2146  cl_int err = ::clGetDeviceIDs(object_, type, 0, NULL, &n);
2147  if (err != CL_SUCCESS) {
2148  return detail::errHandler(err, __GET_DEVICE_IDS_ERR);
2149  }
2150 
2151  cl_device_id* ids = (cl_device_id*) alloca(n * sizeof(cl_device_id));
2152  err = ::clGetDeviceIDs(object_, type, n, ids, NULL);
2153  if (err != CL_SUCCESS) {
2154  return detail::errHandler(err, __GET_DEVICE_IDS_ERR);
2155  }
2156 
2157  devices->assign(&ids[0], &ids[n]);
2158  return CL_SUCCESS;
2159  }
2160 
2161 #if defined(USE_DX_INTEROP)
2162 
2185  cl_int getDevices(
2186  cl_d3d10_device_source_khr d3d_device_source,
2187  void * d3d_object,
2188  cl_d3d10_device_set_khr d3d_device_set,
2189  VECTOR_CLASS<Device>* devices) const
2190  {
2191  typedef CL_API_ENTRY cl_int (CL_API_CALL *PFN_clGetDeviceIDsFromD3D10KHR)(
2192  cl_platform_id platform,
2193  cl_d3d10_device_source_khr d3d_device_source,
2194  void * d3d_object,
2195  cl_d3d10_device_set_khr d3d_device_set,
2196  cl_uint num_entries,
2197  cl_device_id * devices,
2198  cl_uint* num_devices);
2199 
2200  if( devices == NULL ) {
2201  return detail::errHandler(CL_INVALID_ARG_VALUE, __GET_DEVICE_IDS_ERR);
2202  }
2203 
2204  static PFN_clGetDeviceIDsFromD3D10KHR pfn_clGetDeviceIDsFromD3D10KHR = NULL;
2205  __INIT_CL_EXT_FCN_PTR_PLATFORM(object_, clGetDeviceIDsFromD3D10KHR);
2206 
2207  cl_uint n = 0;
2208  cl_int err = pfn_clGetDeviceIDsFromD3D10KHR(
2209  object_,
2210  d3d_device_source,
2211  d3d_object,
2212  d3d_device_set,
2213  0,
2214  NULL,
2215  &n);
2216  if (err != CL_SUCCESS) {
2217  return detail::errHandler(err, __GET_DEVICE_IDS_ERR);
2218  }
2219 
2220  cl_device_id* ids = (cl_device_id*) alloca(n * sizeof(cl_device_id));
2221  err = pfn_clGetDeviceIDsFromD3D10KHR(
2222  object_,
2223  d3d_device_source,
2224  d3d_object,
2225  d3d_device_set,
2226  n,
2227  ids,
2228  NULL);
2229  if (err != CL_SUCCESS) {
2230  return detail::errHandler(err, __GET_DEVICE_IDS_ERR);
2231  }
2232 
2233  devices->assign(&ids[0], &ids[n]);
2234  return CL_SUCCESS;
2235  }
2236 #endif
2237 
2242  static cl_int get(
2243  VECTOR_CLASS<Platform>* platforms)
2244  {
2245  cl_uint n = 0;
2246 
2247  if( platforms == NULL ) {
2248  return detail::errHandler(CL_INVALID_ARG_VALUE, __GET_PLATFORM_IDS_ERR);
2249  }
2250 
2251  cl_int err = ::clGetPlatformIDs(0, NULL, &n);
2252  if (err != CL_SUCCESS) {
2253  return detail::errHandler(err, __GET_PLATFORM_IDS_ERR);
2254  }
2255 
2256  cl_platform_id* ids = (cl_platform_id*) alloca(
2257  n * sizeof(cl_platform_id));
2258  err = ::clGetPlatformIDs(n, ids, NULL);
2259  if (err != CL_SUCCESS) {
2260  return detail::errHandler(err, __GET_PLATFORM_IDS_ERR);
2261  }
2262 
2263  platforms->assign(&ids[0], &ids[n]);
2264  return CL_SUCCESS;
2265  }
2266 
2271  static cl_int get(
2272  Platform * platform)
2273  {
2274  cl_uint n = 0;
2275 
2276  if( platform == NULL ) {
2277  return detail::errHandler(CL_INVALID_ARG_VALUE, __GET_PLATFORM_IDS_ERR);
2278  }
2279 
2280  cl_int err = ::clGetPlatformIDs(0, NULL, &n);
2281  if (err != CL_SUCCESS) {
2282  return detail::errHandler(err, __GET_PLATFORM_IDS_ERR);
2283  }
2284 
2285  cl_platform_id* ids = (cl_platform_id*) alloca(
2286  n * sizeof(cl_platform_id));
2287  err = ::clGetPlatformIDs(n, ids, NULL);
2288  if (err != CL_SUCCESS) {
2289  return detail::errHandler(err, __GET_PLATFORM_IDS_ERR);
2290  }
2291 
2292  *platform = ids[0];
2293  return CL_SUCCESS;
2294  }
2295 
2300  static Platform get(
2301  cl_int * errResult = NULL)
2302  {
2303  Platform platform;
2304  cl_uint n = 0;
2305  cl_int err = ::clGetPlatformIDs(0, NULL, &n);
2306  if (err != CL_SUCCESS) {
2307  detail::errHandler(err, __GET_PLATFORM_IDS_ERR);
2308  if (errResult != NULL) {
2309  *errResult = err;
2310  }
2311  }
2312 
2313  cl_platform_id* ids = (cl_platform_id*) alloca(
2314  n * sizeof(cl_platform_id));
2315  err = ::clGetPlatformIDs(n, ids, NULL);
2316 
2317  if (err != CL_SUCCESS) {
2318  detail::errHandler(err, __GET_PLATFORM_IDS_ERR);
2319  }
2320 
2321  if (errResult != NULL) {
2322  *errResult = err;
2323  }
2324 
2325  return ids[0];
2326  }
2327 
2328  static Platform getDefault(
2329  cl_int *errResult = NULL )
2330  {
2331  return get(errResult);
2332  }
2333 
2334 
2335 #if defined(CL_VERSION_1_2)
2336  cl_int
2338  unloadCompiler()
2339  {
2340  return ::clUnloadPlatformCompiler(object_);
2341  }
2342 #endif // #if defined(CL_VERSION_1_2)
2343 }; // class Platform
2344 
2348 #if defined(CL_USE_DEPRECATED_OPENCL_1_1_APIS) || (defined(CL_VERSION_1_1) && !defined(CL_VERSION_1_2))
2349 
2353 inline CL_EXT_PREFIX__VERSION_1_1_DEPRECATED cl_int
2354 UnloadCompiler() CL_EXT_SUFFIX__VERSION_1_1_DEPRECATED;
2355 inline cl_int
2356 UnloadCompiler()
2357 {
2358  return ::clUnloadCompiler();
2359 }
2360 #endif // #if defined(CL_VERSION_1_1)
2361 
2370 class Context
2371  : public detail::Wrapper<cl_context>
2372 {
2373 private:
2374  static volatile int default_initialized_;
2375  static Context default_;
2376  static volatile cl_int default_error_;
2377 public:
2382  ~Context() { }
2383 
2388  Context(
2389  const VECTOR_CLASS<Device>& devices,
2390  cl_context_properties* properties = NULL,
2391  void (CL_CALLBACK * notifyFptr)(
2392  const char *,
2393  const void *,
2394  ::size_t,
2395  void *) = NULL,
2396  void* data = NULL,
2397  cl_int* err = NULL)
2398  {
2399  cl_int error;
2400 
2401  ::size_t numDevices = devices.size();
2402  cl_device_id* deviceIDs = (cl_device_id*) alloca(numDevices * sizeof(cl_device_id));
2403  for( ::size_t deviceIndex = 0; deviceIndex < numDevices; ++deviceIndex ) {
2404  deviceIDs[deviceIndex] = (devices[deviceIndex])();
2405  }
2406 
2407  object_ = ::clCreateContext(
2408  properties, (cl_uint) numDevices,
2409  deviceIDs,
2410  notifyFptr, data, &error);
2411 
2412  detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_CONTEXT_ERR);
2413  if (err != NULL) {
2414  *err = error;
2415  }
2416  }
2417 
2418  Context(
2419  const Device& device,
2420  cl_context_properties* properties = NULL,
2421  void (CL_CALLBACK * notifyFptr)(
2422  const char *,
2423  const void *,
2424  ::size_t,
2425  void *) = NULL,
2426  void* data = NULL,
2427  cl_int* err = NULL)
2428  {
2429  cl_int error;
2430 
2431  cl_device_id deviceID = device();
2432 
2433  object_ = ::clCreateContext(
2434  properties, 1,
2435  &deviceID,
2436  notifyFptr, data, &error);
2437 
2438  detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_CONTEXT_ERR);
2439  if (err != NULL) {
2440  *err = error;
2441  }
2442  }
2443 
2448  Context(
2449  cl_device_type type,
2450  cl_context_properties* properties = NULL,
2451  void (CL_CALLBACK * notifyFptr)(
2452  const char *,
2453  const void *,
2454  ::size_t,
2455  void *) = NULL,
2456  void* data = NULL,
2457  cl_int* err = NULL)
2458  {
2459  cl_int error;
2460 
2461 #if !defined(__APPLE__) || !defined(__MACOS)
2462  cl_context_properties prop[4] = {CL_CONTEXT_PLATFORM, 0, 0, 0 };
2463 
2464  if (properties == NULL) {
2465  // Get a valid platform ID as we cannot send in a blank one
2466  VECTOR_CLASS<Platform> platforms;
2467  error = Platform::get(&platforms);
2468  if (error != CL_SUCCESS) {
2469  detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_CONTEXT_FROM_TYPE_ERR);
2470  if (err != NULL) {
2471  *err = error;
2472  }
2473  return;
2474  }
2475 
2476  // Check the platforms we found for a device of our specified type
2477  cl_context_properties platform_id = 0;
2478  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < platforms.size(); i++) {
2479 
2480  VECTOR_CLASS<Device> devices;
2481 
2482 #if defined(__CL_ENABLE_EXCEPTIONS)
2483  try {
2484 #endif
2485 
2486  error = platforms[i].getDevices(type, &devices);
2487 
2488 #if defined(__CL_ENABLE_EXCEPTIONS)
2489  } catch (Error) {}
2490  // Catch if exceptions are enabled as we don't want to exit if first platform has no devices of type
2491  // We do error checking next anyway, and can throw there if needed
2492 #endif
2493 
2494  // Only squash CL_SUCCESS and CL_DEVICE_NOT_FOUND
2495  if (error != CL_SUCCESS && error != CL_DEVICE_NOT_FOUND) {
2496  detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_CONTEXT_FROM_TYPE_ERR);
2497  if (err != NULL) {
2498  *err = error;
2499  }
2500  }
2501 
2502  if (devices.size() > 0) {
2503  platform_id = (cl_context_properties)platforms[i]();
2504  break;
2505  }
2506  }
2507 
2508  if (platform_id == 0) {
2509  detail::errHandler(CL_DEVICE_NOT_FOUND, __CREATE_CONTEXT_FROM_TYPE_ERR);
2510  if (err != NULL) {
2511  *err = CL_DEVICE_NOT_FOUND;
2512  }
2513  return;
2514  }
2515 
2516  prop[1] = platform_id;
2517  properties = &prop[0];
2518  }
2519 #endif
2520  object_ = ::clCreateContextFromType(
2521  properties, type, notifyFptr, data, &error);
2522 
2523  detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_CONTEXT_FROM_TYPE_ERR);
2524  if (err != NULL) {
2525  *err = error;
2526  }
2527  }
2528 
2533  static Context getDefault(cl_int * err = NULL)
2534  {
2535  int state = detail::compare_exchange(
2536  &default_initialized_,
2537  __DEFAULT_BEING_INITIALIZED, __DEFAULT_NOT_INITIALIZED);
2538 
2539  if (state & __DEFAULT_INITIALIZED) {
2540  if (err != NULL) {
2541  *err = default_error_;
2542  }
2543  return default_;
2544  }
2545 
2546  if (state & __DEFAULT_BEING_INITIALIZED) {
2547  // Assume writes will propagate eventually...
2548  while(default_initialized_ != __DEFAULT_INITIALIZED) {
2549  detail::fence();
2550  }
2551 
2552  if (err != NULL) {
2553  *err = default_error_;
2554  }
2555  return default_;
2556  }
2557 
2558  cl_int error;
2559  default_ = Context(
2560  CL_DEVICE_TYPE_DEFAULT,
2561  NULL,
2562  NULL,
2563  NULL,
2564  &error);
2565 
2566  detail::fence();
2567 
2568  default_error_ = error;
2569  // Assume writes will propagate eventually...
2570  default_initialized_ = __DEFAULT_INITIALIZED;
2571 
2572  detail::fence();
2573 
2574  if (err != NULL) {
2575  *err = default_error_;
2576  }
2577  return default_;
2578 
2579  }
2580 
2582  Context() : detail::Wrapper<cl_type>() { }
2583 
2588  Context(const Context& context) : detail::Wrapper<cl_type>(context) { }
2589 
2595  __CL_EXPLICIT_CONSTRUCTORS Context(const cl_context& context) : detail::Wrapper<cl_type>(context) { }
2596 
2602  Context& operator = (const Context& rhs)
2603  {
2604  if (this != &rhs) {
2605  detail::Wrapper<cl_type>::operator=(rhs);
2606  }
2607  return *this;
2608  }
2609 
2615  Context& operator = (const cl_context& rhs)
2616  {
2617  detail::Wrapper<cl_type>::operator=(rhs);
2618  return *this;
2619  }
2620 
2622  template <typename T>
2623  cl_int getInfo(cl_context_info name, T* param) const
2624  {
2625  return detail::errHandler(
2626  detail::getInfo(&::clGetContextInfo, object_, name, param),
2627  __GET_CONTEXT_INFO_ERR);
2628  }
2629 
2631  template <cl_int name> typename
2632  detail::param_traits<detail::cl_context_info, name>::param_type
2633  getInfo(cl_int* err = NULL) const
2634  {
2635  typename detail::param_traits<
2636  detail::cl_context_info, name>::param_type param;
2637  cl_int result = getInfo(name, &param);
2638  if (err != NULL) {
2639  *err = result;
2640  }
2641  return param;
2642  }
2643 
2648  cl_int getSupportedImageFormats(
2649  cl_mem_flags flags,
2650  cl_mem_object_type type,
2651  VECTOR_CLASS<ImageFormat>* formats) const
2652  {
2653  cl_uint numEntries;
2654  cl_int err = ::clGetSupportedImageFormats(
2655  object_,
2656  flags,
2657  type,
2658  0,
2659  NULL,
2660  &numEntries);
2661  if (err != CL_SUCCESS) {
2662  return detail::errHandler(err, __GET_SUPPORTED_IMAGE_FORMATS_ERR);
2663  }
2664 
2665  ImageFormat* value = (ImageFormat*)
2666  alloca(numEntries * sizeof(ImageFormat));
2667  err = ::clGetSupportedImageFormats(
2668  object_,
2669  flags,
2670  type,
2671  numEntries,
2672  (cl_image_format*) value,
2673  NULL);
2674  if (err != CL_SUCCESS) {
2675  return detail::errHandler(err, __GET_SUPPORTED_IMAGE_FORMATS_ERR);
2676  }
2677 
2678  formats->assign(&value[0], &value[numEntries]);
2679  return CL_SUCCESS;
2680  }
2681 };
2682 
2683 inline Device Device::getDefault(cl_int * err)
2684 {
2685  cl_int error;
2686  Device device;
2687 
2688  Context context = Context::getDefault(&error);
2689  detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_COMMAND_QUEUE_ERR);
2690 
2691  if (error != CL_SUCCESS) {
2692  if (err != NULL) {
2693  *err = error;
2694  }
2695  }
2696  else {
2697  device = context.getInfo<CL_CONTEXT_DEVICES>()[0];
2698  if (err != NULL) {
2699  *err = CL_SUCCESS;
2700  }
2701  }
2702 
2703  return device;
2704 }
2705 
2706 
2707 #ifdef _WIN32
2708 __declspec(selectany) volatile int Context::default_initialized_ = __DEFAULT_NOT_INITIALIZED;
2709 __declspec(selectany) Context Context::default_;
2710 __declspec(selectany) volatile cl_int Context::default_error_ = CL_SUCCESS;
2711 #else
2712 __attribute__((weak)) volatile int Context::default_initialized_ = __DEFAULT_NOT_INITIALIZED;
2713 __attribute__((weak)) Context Context::default_;
2714 __attribute__((weak)) volatile cl_int Context::default_error_ = CL_SUCCESS;
2715 #endif
2716

2802  &::clGetEventProfilingInfo, object_, name, param),
2803  __GET_EVENT_PROFILE_INFO_ERR);
2804  }

3043 // Pre-declare copy functions
3044 class Buffer;
3045 template< typename IteratorType >
3046 cl_int copy( IteratorType startIterator, IteratorType endIterator, cl::Buffer &buffer );
3047 template< typename IteratorType >
3048 cl_int copy( const cl::Buffer &buffer, IteratorType startIterator, IteratorType endIterator );
3049 template< typename IteratorType >
3050 cl_int copy( const CommandQueue &queue, IteratorType startIterator, IteratorType endIterator, cl::Buffer &buffer );
3051 template< typename IteratorType >
3052 cl_int copy( const CommandQueue &queue, const cl::Buffer &buffer, IteratorType startIterator, IteratorType endIterator );
3053 
3054 
3061 class Buffer : public Memory
3062 {
3063 public:
3064 
3072  Buffer(
3073  const Context& context,
3074  cl_mem_flags flags,
3075  ::size_t size,
3076  void* host_ptr = NULL,
3077  cl_int* err = NULL)
3078  {
3079  cl_int error;
3080  object_ = ::clCreateBuffer(context(), flags, size, host_ptr, &error);
3081 
3082  detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_BUFFER_ERR);
3083  if (err != NULL) {
3084  *err = error;
3085  }
3086  }
3087 
3097  Buffer(
3098  cl_mem_flags flags,
3099  ::size_t size,
3100  void* host_ptr = NULL,
3101  cl_int* err = NULL)
3102  {
3103  cl_int error;
3104 
3105  Context context = Context::getDefault(err);
3106 
3107  object_ = ::clCreateBuffer(context(), flags, size, host_ptr, &error);
3108 
3109  detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_BUFFER_ERR);
3110  if (err != NULL) {
3111  *err = error;
3112  }
3113  }
3114 
3120  template< typename IteratorType >
3121  Buffer(
3122  IteratorType startIterator,
3123  IteratorType endIterator,
3124  bool readOnly,
3125  bool useHostPtr = false,
3126  cl_int* err = NULL)
3127  {
3128  typedef typename std::iterator_traits<IteratorType>::value_type DataType;
3129  cl_int error;
3130 
3131  cl_mem_flags flags = 0;
3132  if( readOnly ) {
3133  flags |= CL_MEM_READ_ONLY;
3134  }
3135  else {
3136  flags |= CL_MEM_READ_WRITE;
3137  }
3138  if( useHostPtr ) {
3139  flags |= CL_MEM_USE_HOST_PTR;
3140  }
3141 
3142  ::size_t size = sizeof(DataType)*(endIterator - startIterator);
3143 
3144  Context context = Context::getDefault(err);
3145 
3146  if( useHostPtr ) {
3147  object_ = ::clCreateBuffer(context(), flags, size, static_cast<DataType*>(&*startIterator), &error);
3148  } else {
3149  object_ = ::clCreateBuffer(context(), flags, size, 0, &error);
3150  }
3151 
3152  detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_BUFFER_ERR);
3153  if (err != NULL) {
3154  *err = error;
3155  }
3156 
3157  if( !useHostPtr ) {
3158  error = cl::copy(startIterator, endIterator, *this);
3159  detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_BUFFER_ERR);
3160  if (err != NULL) {
3161  *err = error;
3162  }
3163  }
3164  }
3165 
3171  template< typename IteratorType >
3172  Buffer(const Context &context, IteratorType startIterator, IteratorType endIterator,
3173  bool readOnly, bool useHostPtr = false, cl_int* err = NULL);
3174 
3176  Buffer() : Memory() { }
3177 
3182  Buffer(const Buffer& buffer) : Memory(buffer) { }
3183 
3188  __CL_EXPLICIT_CONSTRUCTORS Buffer(const cl_mem& buffer) : Memory(buffer) { }
3189 
3194  Buffer& operator = (const Buffer& rhs)
3195  {
3196  if (this != &rhs) {
3197  Memory::operator=(rhs);
3198  }
3199  return *this;
3200  }
3201 
3206  Buffer& operator = (const cl_mem& rhs)
3207  {
3208  Memory::operator=(rhs);
3209  return *this;
3210  }
3211 
3212 #if defined(CL_VERSION_1_1)
3213 
3217  Buffer createSubBuffer(
3218  cl_mem_flags flags,
3219  cl_buffer_create_type buffer_create_type,
3220  const void * buffer_create_info,
3221  cl_int * err = NULL)
3222  {
3223  Buffer result;
3224  cl_int error;
3225  result.object_ = ::clCreateSubBuffer(
3226  object_,
3227  flags,
3228  buffer_create_type,
3229  buffer_create_info,
3230  &error);
3231 
3232  detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_SUBBUFFER_ERR);
3233  if (err != NULL) {
3234  *err = error;
3235  }
3236 
3237  return result;
3238  }
3239 #endif
3240 };
3241 
3242 #if defined (USE_DX_INTEROP)
3243 
3251 class BufferD3D10 : public Buffer
3252 {
3253 public:
3254  typedef CL_API_ENTRY cl_mem (CL_API_CALL *PFN_clCreateFromD3D10BufferKHR)(
3255  cl_context context, cl_mem_flags flags, ID3D10Buffer* buffer,
3256  cl_int* errcode_ret);
3257 
3263  BufferD3D10(
3264  const Context& context,
3265  cl_mem_flags flags,
3266  ID3D10Buffer* bufobj,
3267  cl_int * err = NULL)
3268  {
3269  static PFN_clCreateFromD3D10BufferKHR pfn_clCreateFromD3D10BufferKHR = NULL;
3270 
3271 #if defined(CL_VERSION_1_2)
3272  vector<cl_context_properties> props = context.getInfo<CL_CONTEXT_PROPERTIES>();
3273  cl_platform platform = -1;
3274  for( int i = 0; i < props.size(); ++i ) {
3275  if( props[i] == CL_CONTEXT_PLATFORM ) {
3276  platform = props[i+1];
3277  }
3278  }
3279  __INIT_CL_EXT_FCN_PTR_PLATFORM(platform, clCreateFromD3D10BufferKHR);
3280 #endif
3281 #if defined(CL_VERSION_1_1)
3282  __INIT_CL_EXT_FCN_PTR(clCreateFromD3D10BufferKHR);
3283 #endif
3284 
3285  cl_int error;
3286  object_ = pfn_clCreateFromD3D10BufferKHR(
3287  context(),
3288  flags,
3289  bufobj,
3290  &error);
3291 
3292  detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_GL_BUFFER_ERR);
3293  if (err != NULL) {
3294  *err = error;
3295  }
3296  }
3297 
3299  BufferD3D10() : Buffer() { }
3300 
3305  BufferD3D10(const BufferD3D10& buffer) : Buffer(buffer) { }
3306 
3311  __CL_EXPLICIT_CONSTRUCTORS BufferD3D10(const cl_mem& buffer) : Buffer(buffer) { }
3312 
3317  BufferD3D10& operator = (const BufferD3D10& rhs)
3318  {
3319  if (this != &rhs) {
3320  Buffer::operator=(rhs);
3321  }
3322  return *this;
3323  }
3324 
3329  BufferD3D10& operator = (const cl_mem& rhs)
3330  {
3331  Buffer::operator=(rhs);
3332  return *this;
3333  }
3334 };
3335 #endif

3509 class Image : public Memory
3510 {
3511 protected:
3513  Image() : Memory() { }
3514 
3519  Image(const Image& image) : Memory(image) { }
3520 
3525  __CL_EXPLICIT_CONSTRUCTORS Image(const cl_mem& image) : Memory(image) { }
3526 
3531  Image& operator = (const Image& rhs)
3532  {
3533  if (this != &rhs) {
3534  Memory::operator=(rhs);
3535  }
3536  return *this;
3537  }
3538 
3543  Image& operator = (const cl_mem& rhs)
3544  {
3545  Memory::operator=(rhs);
3546  return *this;
3547  }
3548 
3549 public:
3551  template <typename T>
3552  cl_int getImageInfo(cl_image_info name, T* param) const
3553  {
3554  return detail::errHandler(
3555  detail::getInfo(&::clGetImageInfo, object_, name, param),
3556  __GET_IMAGE_INFO_ERR);
3557  }
3558 
3560  template <cl_int name> typename
3561  detail::param_traits<detail::cl_image_info, name>::param_type
3562  getImageInfo(cl_int* err = NULL) const
3563  {
3564  typename detail::param_traits<
3565  detail::cl_image_info, name>::param_type param;
3566  cl_int result = getImageInfo(name, &param);
3567  if (err != NULL) {
3568  *err = result;
3569  }
3570  return param;
3571  }
3572 };

3774 
3781 class Image2D : public Image
3782 {
3783 public:
3788  Image2D(
3789  const Context& context,
3790  cl_mem_flags flags,
3791  ImageFormat format,
3792  ::size_t width,
3793  ::size_t height,
3794  ::size_t row_pitch = 0,
3795  void* host_ptr = NULL,
3796  cl_int* err = NULL)
3797  {
3798  cl_int error;
3799  bool useCreateImage;
3800 
3801 #if defined(CL_VERSION_1_2) && defined(CL_USE_DEPRECATED_OPENCL_1_1_APIS)
3802  // Run-time decision based on the actual platform
3803  {
3804  cl_uint version = detail::getContextPlatformVersion(context());
3805  useCreateImage = (version >= 0x10002); // OpenCL 1.2 or above
3806  }
3807 #elif defined(CL_VERSION_1_2)
3808  useCreateImage = true;
3809 #else
3810  useCreateImage = false;
3811 #endif
3812 
3813 #if defined(CL_VERSION_1_2)
3814  if (useCreateImage)
3815  {
3816  cl_image_desc desc =
3817  {
3818  CL_MEM_OBJECT_IMAGE2D,
3819  width,
3820  height,
3821  0, 0, // depth, array size (unused)
3822  row_pitch,
3823  0, 0, 0, 0
3824  };
3825  object_ = ::clCreateImage(
3826  context(),
3827  flags,
3828  &format,
3829  &desc,
3830  host_ptr,
3831  &error);
3832 
3833  detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_IMAGE_ERR);
3834  if (err != NULL) {
3835  *err = error;
3836  }
3837  }
3838 #endif // #if defined(CL_VERSION_1_2)
3839 #if !defined(CL_VERSION_1_2) || defined(CL_USE_DEPRECATED_OPENCL_1_1_APIS)
3840  if (!useCreateImage)
3841  {
3842  object_ = ::clCreateImage2D(
3843  context(), flags,&format, width, height, row_pitch, host_ptr, &error);
3844 
3845  detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_IMAGE2D_ERR);
3846  if (err != NULL) {
3847  *err = error;
3848  }
3849  }
3850 #endif // #if !defined(CL_VERSION_1_2) || defined(CL_USE_DEPRECATED_OPENCL_1_1_APIS)
3851  }
3852 
3854  Image2D() { }
3855 
3860  Image2D(const Image2D& image2D) : Image(image2D) { }
3861 
3866  __CL_EXPLICIT_CONSTRUCTORS Image2D(const cl_mem& image2D) : Image(image2D) { }
3867 
3872  Image2D& operator = (const Image2D& rhs)
3873  {
3874  if (this != &rhs) {
3875  Image::operator=(rhs);
3876  }
3877  return *this;
3878  }
3879 
3884  Image2D& operator = (const cl_mem& rhs)
3885  {
3886  Image::operator=(rhs);
3887  return *this;
3888  }
3889 };
3890 
3891 
3892 #if !defined(CL_VERSION_1_2)
3893

4039 
4046 class Image3D : public Image
4047 {
4048 public:
4053  Image3D(
4054  const Context& context,
4055  cl_mem_flags flags,
4056  ImageFormat format,
4057  ::size_t width,
4058  ::size_t height,
4059  ::size_t depth,
4060  ::size_t row_pitch = 0,
4061  ::size_t slice_pitch = 0,
4062  void* host_ptr = NULL,
4063  cl_int* err = NULL)
4064  {
4065  cl_int error;
4066  bool useCreateImage;
4067 
4068 #if defined(CL_VERSION_1_2) && defined(CL_USE_DEPRECATED_OPENCL_1_1_APIS)
4069  // Run-time decision based on the actual platform
4070  {
4071  cl_uint version = detail::getContextPlatformVersion(context());
4072  useCreateImage = (version >= 0x10002); // OpenCL 1.2 or above
4073  }
4074 #elif defined(CL_VERSION_1_2)
4075  useCreateImage = true;
4076 #else
4077  useCreateImage = false;
4078 #endif
4079 
4080 #if defined(CL_VERSION_1_2)
4081  if (useCreateImage)
4082  {
4083  cl_image_desc desc =
4084  {
4085  CL_MEM_OBJECT_IMAGE3D,
4086  width,
4087  height,
4088  depth,
4089  0, // array size (unused)
4090  row_pitch,
4091  slice_pitch,
4092  0, 0, 0
4093  };
4094  object_ = ::clCreateImage(
4095  context(),
4096  flags,
4097  &format,
4098  &desc,
4099  host_ptr,
4100  &error);
4101 
4102  detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_IMAGE_ERR);
4103  if (err != NULL) {
4104  *err = error;
4105  }
4106  }
4107 #endif // #if defined(CL_VERSION_1_2)
4108 #if !defined(CL_VERSION_1_2) || defined(CL_USE_DEPRECATED_OPENCL_1_1_APIS)
4109  if (!useCreateImage)
4110  {
4111  object_ = ::clCreateImage3D(
4112  context(), flags, &format, width, height, depth, row_pitch,
4113  slice_pitch, host_ptr, &error);
4114 
4115  detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_IMAGE3D_ERR);
4116  if (err != NULL) {
4117  *err = error;
4118  }
4119  }
4120 #endif // #if !defined(CL_VERSION_1_2) || defined(CL_USE_DEPRECATED_OPENCL_1_1_APIS)
4121  }
4122 
4124  Image3D() { }
4125 
4130  Image3D(const Image3D& image3D) : Image(image3D) { }
4131 
4136  __CL_EXPLICIT_CONSTRUCTORS Image3D(const cl_mem& image3D) : Image(image3D) { }
4137 
4142  Image3D& operator = (const Image3D& rhs)
4143  {
4144  if (this != &rhs) {
4145  Image::operator=(rhs);
4146  }
4147  return *this;
4148  }
4149 
4154  Image3D& operator = (const cl_mem& rhs)
4155  {
4156  Image::operator=(rhs);
4157  return *this;
4158  }
4159 };
4160

4179  const Context& context,

4198  }
4199  }

4209 
4214  __CL_EXPLICIT_CONSTRUCTORS Image3DGL(const cl_mem& image) : Image3D(image) { }

4221  {

4223  Image3D::operator=(rhs);

4406 class NDRange
4407 {
4408 private:
4409  size_t<3> sizes_;
4410  cl_uint dimensions_;
4411 
4412 public:
4414  NDRange()
4415  : dimensions_(0)
4416  { }
4417 
4419  NDRange(::size_t size0)
4420  : dimensions_(1)
4421  {
4422  sizes_[0] = size0;
4423  }
4424 
4426  NDRange(::size_t size0, ::size_t size1)
4427  : dimensions_(2)
4428  {
4429  sizes_[0] = size0;
4430  sizes_[1] = size1;
4431  }
4432 
4434  NDRange(::size_t size0, ::size_t size1, ::size_t size2)
4435  : dimensions_(3)
4436  {
4437  sizes_[0] = size0;
4438  sizes_[1] = size1;
4439  sizes_[2] = size2;
4440  }
4441 
4446  operator const ::size_t*() const {
4447  return (const ::size_t*) sizes_;
4448  }
4449 
4451  ::size_t dimensions() const { return dimensions_; }
4452 };
4453 
4455 static const NDRange NullRange;
4456 
4458 struct LocalSpaceArg
4459 {
4460  ::size_t size_;
4461 };
4462 
4463 namespace detail {
4464 
4465 template <typename T>
4466 struct KernelArgumentHandler
4467 {
4468  static ::size_t size(const T&) { return sizeof(T); }
4469  static T* ptr(T& value) { return &value; }
4470 };
4471 
4472 template <>
4473 struct KernelArgumentHandler<LocalSpaceArg>
4474 {
4475  static ::size_t size(const LocalSpaceArg& value) { return value.size_; }
4476  static void* ptr(LocalSpaceArg&) { return NULL; }
4477 };
4478 
4479 }
4481 
4486 inline CL_EXT_PREFIX__VERSION_1_1_DEPRECATED LocalSpaceArg
4487 __local(::size_t size) CL_EXT_SUFFIX__VERSION_1_1_DEPRECATED;
4488 inline LocalSpaceArg
4489 __local(::size_t size)
4490 {
4491  LocalSpaceArg ret = { size };
4492  return ret;
4493 }
4494 
4498 inline LocalSpaceArg
4499 Local(::size_t size)
4500 {
4501  LocalSpaceArg ret = { size };
4502  return ret;
4503 }
4504

4635  {

4637  ::clSetKernelArg(
4638  object_,
4639  index,
4640  detail::KernelArgumentHandler<T>::size(value),
4641  detail::KernelArgumentHandler<T>::ptr(value)),
4642  __SET_KERNEL_ARGS_ERR);
4643  }

4646  {

4649  __SET_KERNEL_ARGS_ERR);
4650  }

4652 
4656 class Program : public detail::Wrapper<cl_program>
4657 {
4658 public:
4659  typedef VECTOR_CLASS<std::pair<const void*, ::size_t> > Binaries;
4660  typedef VECTOR_CLASS<std::pair<const char*, ::size_t> > Sources;
4661 
4662  Program(
4663  const STRING_CLASS& source,
4664  bool build = false,
4665  cl_int* err = NULL)
4666  {
4667  cl_int error;
4668 
4669  const char * strings = source.c_str();
4670  const ::size_t length = source.size();
4671 
4672  Context context = Context::getDefault(err);
4673 
4674  object_ = ::clCreateProgramWithSource(
4675  context(), (cl_uint)1, &strings, &length, &error);
4676 
4677  detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_PROGRAM_WITH_SOURCE_ERR);
4678 
4679  if (error == CL_SUCCESS && build) {
4680 
4681  error = ::clBuildProgram(
4682  object_,
4683  0,
4684  NULL,
4685  "",
4686  NULL,
4687  NULL);
4688 
4689  detail::errHandler(error, __BUILD_PROGRAM_ERR);
4690  }
4691 
4692  if (err != NULL) {
4693  *err = error;
4694  }
4695  }
4696 
4697  Program(
4698  const Context& context,
4699  const STRING_CLASS& source,
4700  bool build = false,
4701  cl_int* err = NULL)
4702  {
4703  cl_int error;
4704 
4705  const char * strings = source.c_str();
4706  const ::size_t length = source.size();
4707 
4708  object_ = ::clCreateProgramWithSource(
4709  context(), (cl_uint)1, &strings, &length, &error);
4710 
4711  detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_PROGRAM_WITH_SOURCE_ERR);
4712 
4713  if (error == CL_SUCCESS && build) {
4714 
4715  error = ::clBuildProgram(
4716  object_,
4717  0,
4718  NULL,
4719  "",
4720  NULL,
4721  NULL);
4722 
4723  detail::errHandler(error, __BUILD_PROGRAM_ERR);
4724  }
4725 
4726  if (err != NULL) {
4727  *err = error;
4728  }
4729  }
4730 
4731  Program(
4732  const Context& context,
4733  const Sources& sources,
4734  cl_int* err = NULL)
4735  {
4736  cl_int error;
4737 
4738  const ::size_t n = (::size_t)sources.size();
4739  ::size_t* lengths = (::size_t*) alloca(n * sizeof(::size_t));
4740  const char** strings = (const char**) alloca(n * sizeof(const char*));
4741 
4742  for (::size_t i = 0; i < n; ++i) {
4743  strings[i] = sources[(int)i].first;
4744  lengths[i] = sources[(int)i].second;
4745  }
4746 
4747  object_ = ::clCreateProgramWithSource(
4748  context(), (cl_uint)n, strings, lengths, &error);
4749 
4750  detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_PROGRAM_WITH_SOURCE_ERR);
4751  if (err != NULL) {
4752  *err = error;
4753  }
4754  }
4755 
4775  Program(
4776  const Context& context,
4777  const VECTOR_CLASS<Device>& devices,
4778  const Binaries& binaries,
4779  VECTOR_CLASS<cl_int>* binaryStatus = NULL,
4780  cl_int* err = NULL)
4781  {
4782  cl_int error;
4783 
4784  const ::size_t numDevices = devices.size();
4785 
4786  // Catch size mismatch early and return
4787  if(binaries.size() != numDevices) {
4788  error = CL_INVALID_VALUE;
4789  detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_PROGRAM_WITH_BINARY_ERR);
4790  if (err != NULL) {
4791  *err = error;
4792  }
4793  return;
4794  }
4795 
4796  ::size_t* lengths = (::size_t*) alloca(numDevices * sizeof(::size_t));
4797  const unsigned char** images = (const unsigned char**) alloca(numDevices * sizeof(const unsigned char**));
4798 
4799  for (::size_t i = 0; i < numDevices; ++i) {
4800  images[i] = (const unsigned char*)binaries[i].first;
4801  lengths[i] = binaries[(int)i].second;
4802  }
4803 
4804  cl_device_id* deviceIDs = (cl_device_id*) alloca(numDevices * sizeof(cl_device_id));
4805  for( ::size_t deviceIndex = 0; deviceIndex < numDevices; ++deviceIndex ) {
4806  deviceIDs[deviceIndex] = (devices[deviceIndex])();
4807  }
4808 
4809  if(binaryStatus) {
4810  binaryStatus->resize(numDevices);
4811  }
4812 
4813  object_ = ::clCreateProgramWithBinary(
4814  context(), (cl_uint) devices.size(),
4815  deviceIDs,
4816  lengths, images, binaryStatus != NULL
4817  ? &binaryStatus->front()
4818  : NULL, &error);
4819 
4820  detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_PROGRAM_WITH_BINARY_ERR);
4821  if (err != NULL) {
4822  *err = error;
4823  }
4824  }
4825 
4826 
4827 #if defined(CL_VERSION_1_2)
4828 
4832  Program(
4833  const Context& context,
4834  const VECTOR_CLASS<Device>& devices,
4835  const STRING_CLASS& kernelNames,
4836  cl_int* err = NULL)
4837  {
4838  cl_int error;
4839 
4840 
4841  ::size_t numDevices = devices.size();
4842  cl_device_id* deviceIDs = (cl_device_id*) alloca(numDevices * sizeof(cl_device_id));
4843  for( ::size_t deviceIndex = 0; deviceIndex < numDevices; ++deviceIndex ) {
4844  deviceIDs[deviceIndex] = (devices[deviceIndex])();
4845  }
4846 
4847  object_ = ::clCreateProgramWithBuiltInKernels(
4848  context(),
4849  (cl_uint) devices.size(),
4850  deviceIDs,
4851  kernelNames.c_str(),
4852  &error);
4853 
4854  detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_PROGRAM_WITH_BUILT_IN_KERNELS_ERR);
4855  if (err != NULL) {
4856  *err = error;
4857  }
4858  }
4859 #endif // #if defined(CL_VERSION_1_2)
4860 
4861  Program() { }
4862 
4863  Program(const Program& program) : detail::Wrapper<cl_type>(program) { }
4864 
4865  __CL_EXPLICIT_CONSTRUCTORS Program(const cl_program& program) : detail::Wrapper<cl_type>(program) { }
4866 
4867  Program& operator = (const Program& rhs)
4868  {
4869  if (this != &rhs) {
4870  detail::Wrapper<cl_type>::operator=(rhs);
4871  }
4872  return *this;
4873  }
4874 
4875  Program& operator = (const cl_program& rhs)
4876  {
4877  detail::Wrapper<cl_type>::operator=(rhs);
4878  return *this;
4879  }
4880 
4881  cl_int build(
4882  const VECTOR_CLASS<Device>& devices,
4883  const char* options = NULL,
4884  void (CL_CALLBACK * notifyFptr)(cl_program, void *) = NULL,
4885  void* data = NULL) const
4886  {
4887  ::size_t numDevices = devices.size();
4888  cl_device_id* deviceIDs = (cl_device_id*) alloca(numDevices * sizeof(cl_device_id));
4889  for( ::size_t deviceIndex = 0; deviceIndex < numDevices; ++deviceIndex ) {
4890  deviceIDs[deviceIndex] = (devices[deviceIndex])();
4891  }
4892 
4893  return detail::errHandler(
4894  ::clBuildProgram(
4895  object_,
4896  (cl_uint)
4897  devices.size(),
4898  deviceIDs,
4899  options,
4900  notifyFptr,
4901  data),
4902  __BUILD_PROGRAM_ERR);
4903  }
4904 
4905  cl_int build(
4906  const char* options = NULL,
4907  void (CL_CALLBACK * notifyFptr)(cl_program, void *) = NULL,
4908  void* data = NULL) const
4909  {
4910  return detail::errHandler(
4911  ::clBuildProgram(
4912  object_,
4913  0,
4914  NULL,
4915  options,
4916  notifyFptr,
4917  data),
4918  __BUILD_PROGRAM_ERR);
4919  }
4920 
4921 #if defined(CL_VERSION_1_2)
4922  cl_int compile(
4923  const char* options = NULL,
4924  void (CL_CALLBACK * notifyFptr)(cl_program, void *) = NULL,
4925  void* data = NULL) const
4926  {
4927  return detail::errHandler(
4928  ::clCompileProgram(
4929  object_,
4930  0,
4931  NULL,
4932  options,
4933  0,
4934  NULL,
4935  NULL,
4936  notifyFptr,
4937  data),
4938  __COMPILE_PROGRAM_ERR);
4939  }
4940 #endif
4941 
4942  template <typename T>
4943  cl_int getInfo(cl_program_info name, T* param) const
4944  {
4945  return detail::errHandler(
4946  detail::getInfo(&::clGetProgramInfo, object_, name, param),
4947  __GET_PROGRAM_INFO_ERR);
4948  }
4949 
4950  template <cl_int name> typename
4951  detail::param_traits<detail::cl_program_info, name>::param_type
4952  getInfo(cl_int* err = NULL) const
4953  {
4954  typename detail::param_traits<
4955  detail::cl_program_info, name>::param_type param;
4956  cl_int result = getInfo(name, &param);
4957  if (err != NULL) {
4958  *err = result;
4959  }
4960  return param;
4961  }
4962 
4963  template <typename T>
4964  cl_int getBuildInfo(
4965  const Device& device, cl_program_build_info name, T* param) const
4966  {
4967  return detail::errHandler(
4968  detail::getInfo(
4969  &::clGetProgramBuildInfo, object_, device(), name, param),
4970  __GET_PROGRAM_BUILD_INFO_ERR);
4971  }
4972 
4973  template <cl_int name> typename
4974  detail::param_traits<detail::cl_program_build_info, name>::param_type
4975  getBuildInfo(const Device& device, cl_int* err = NULL) const
4976  {
4977  typename detail::param_traits<
4978  detail::cl_program_build_info, name>::param_type param;
4979  cl_int result = getBuildInfo(device, name, &param);
4980  if (err != NULL) {
4981  *err = result;
4982  }
4983  return param;
4984  }
4985 
4986  cl_int createKernels(VECTOR_CLASS<Kernel>* kernels)
4987  {
4988  cl_uint numKernels;
4989  cl_int err = ::clCreateKernelsInProgram(object_, 0, NULL, &numKernels);
4990  if (err != CL_SUCCESS) {
4991  return detail::errHandler(err, __CREATE_KERNELS_IN_PROGRAM_ERR);
4992  }
4993 
4994  Kernel* value = (Kernel*) alloca(numKernels * sizeof(Kernel));
4995  err = ::clCreateKernelsInProgram(
4996  object_, numKernels, (cl_kernel*) value, NULL);
4997  if (err != CL_SUCCESS) {
4998  return detail::errHandler(err, __CREATE_KERNELS_IN_PROGRAM_ERR);
4999  }
5000 
5001  kernels->assign(&value[0], &value[numKernels]);
5002  return CL_SUCCESS;
5003  }
5004 };
5005 
5006 #if defined(CL_VERSION_1_2)
5007 inline Program linkProgram(
5008  Program input1,
5009  Program input2,
5010  const char* options = NULL,
5011  void (CL_CALLBACK * notifyFptr)(cl_program, void *) = NULL,
5012  void* data = NULL,
5013  cl_int* err = NULL)
5014 {
5015  cl_int err_local = CL_SUCCESS;
5016 
5017  cl_program programs[2] = { input1(), input2() };
5018 
5019  Context ctx = input1.getInfo<CL_PROGRAM_CONTEXT>();
5020 
5021  cl_program prog = ::clLinkProgram(
5022  ctx(),
5023  0,
5024  NULL,
5025  options,
5026  2,
5027  programs,
5028  notifyFptr,
5029  data,
5030  &err_local);
5031 
5032  detail::errHandler(err_local,__COMPILE_PROGRAM_ERR);
5033  if (err != NULL) {
5034  *err = err_local;
5035  }
5036 
5037  return Program(prog);
5038 }
5039 
5040 inline Program linkProgram(
5041  VECTOR_CLASS<Program> inputPrograms,
5042  const char* options = NULL,
5043  void (CL_CALLBACK * notifyFptr)(cl_program, void *) = NULL,
5044  void* data = NULL,
5045  cl_int* err = NULL)
5046 {
5047  cl_int err_local = CL_SUCCESS;
5048 
5049  cl_program * programs = (cl_program*) alloca(inputPrograms.size() * sizeof(cl_program));
5050 
5051  if (programs != NULL) {
5052  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < inputPrograms.size(); i++) {
5053  programs[i] = inputPrograms[i]();
5054  }
5055  }
5056 
5057  cl_program prog = ::clLinkProgram(
5058  Context::getDefault()(),
5059  0,
5060  NULL,
5061  options,
5062  (cl_uint)inputPrograms.size(),
5063  programs,
5064  notifyFptr,
5065  data,
5066  &err_local);
5067 
5068  detail::errHandler(err_local,__COMPILE_PROGRAM_ERR);
5069  if (err != NULL) {
5070  *err = err_local;
5071  }
5072 
5073  return Program(prog);
5074 }
5075 #endif
5076 
5077 template<>
5078 inline VECTOR_CLASS<char *> cl::Program::getInfo<CL_PROGRAM_BINARIES>(cl_int* err) const
5079 {
5080  VECTOR_CLASS< ::size_t> sizes = getInfo<CL_PROGRAM_BINARY_SIZES>();
5081  VECTOR_CLASS<char *> binaries;
5082  for (VECTOR_CLASS< ::size_t>::iterator s = sizes.begin(); s != sizes.end(); ++s)
5083  {
5084  char *ptr = NULL;
5085  if (*s != 0)
5086  ptr = new char[*s];
5087  binaries.push_back(ptr);
5088  }
5089 
5090  cl_int result = getInfo(CL_PROGRAM_BINARIES, &binaries);
5091  if (err != NULL) {
5092  *err = result;
5093  }
5094  return binaries;
5095 }
5096 
5097 inline Kernel::Kernel(const Program& program, const char* name, cl_int* err)
5098 {
5099  cl_int error;
5100 
5101  object_ = ::clCreateKernel(program(), name, &error);
5102  detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_KERNEL_ERR);
5103 
5104  if (err != NULL) {
5105  *err = error;
5106  }
5107 
5108 }
5109 
5113 class CommandQueue : public detail::Wrapper<cl_command_queue>
5114 {
5115 private:
5116  static volatile int default_initialized_;
5117  static CommandQueue default_;
5118  static volatile cl_int default_error_;
5119 public:
5120  CommandQueue(
5121  cl_command_queue_properties properties,
5122  cl_int* err = NULL)
5123  {
5124  cl_int error;
5125 
5126  Context context = Context::getDefault(&error);
5127  detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_COMMAND_QUEUE_ERR);
5128 
5129  if (error != CL_SUCCESS) {
5130  if (err != NULL) {
5131  *err = error;
5132  }
5133  }
5134  else {
5135  Device device = context.getInfo<CL_CONTEXT_DEVICES>()[0];
5136 
5137  object_ = ::clCreateCommandQueue(
5138  context(), device(), properties, &error);
5139 
5140  detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_COMMAND_QUEUE_ERR);
5141  if (err != NULL) {
5142  *err = error;
5143  }
5144  }
5145  }
5149  explicit CommandQueue(
5150  const Context& context,
5151  cl_command_queue_properties properties = 0,
5152  cl_int* err = NULL)
5153  {
5154  cl_int error;
5155  VECTOR_CLASS<cl::Device> devices;
5156  error = context.getInfo(CL_CONTEXT_DEVICES, &devices);
5157 
5158  detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_COMMAND_QUEUE_ERR);
5159 
5160  if (error != CL_SUCCESS)
5161  {
5162  if (err != NULL) {
5163  *err = error;
5164  }
5165  return;
5166  }
5167 
5168  object_ = ::clCreateCommandQueue(context(), devices[0](), properties, &error);
5169 
5170  detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_COMMAND_QUEUE_ERR);
5171 
5172  if (err != NULL) {
5173  *err = error;
5174  }
5175 
5176  }
5177 
5178  CommandQueue(
5179  const Context& context,
5180  const Device& device,
5181  cl_command_queue_properties properties = 0,
5182  cl_int* err = NULL)
5183  {
5184  cl_int error;
5185  object_ = ::clCreateCommandQueue(
5186  context(), device(), properties, &error);
5187 
5188  detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_COMMAND_QUEUE_ERR);
5189  if (err != NULL) {
5190  *err = error;
5191  }
5192  }
5193 
5194  static CommandQueue getDefault(cl_int * err = NULL)
5195  {
5196  int state = detail::compare_exchange(
5197  &default_initialized_,
5198  __DEFAULT_BEING_INITIALIZED, __DEFAULT_NOT_INITIALIZED);
5199 
5200  if (state & __DEFAULT_INITIALIZED) {
5201  if (err != NULL) {
5202  *err = default_error_;
5203  }
5204  return default_;
5205  }
5206 
5207  if (state & __DEFAULT_BEING_INITIALIZED) {
5208  // Assume writes will propagate eventually...
5209  while(default_initialized_ != __DEFAULT_INITIALIZED) {
5210  detail::fence();
5211  }
5212 
5213  if (err != NULL) {
5214  *err = default_error_;
5215  }
5216  return default_;
5217  }
5218 
5219  cl_int error;
5220 
5221  Context context = Context::getDefault(&error);
5222  detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_COMMAND_QUEUE_ERR);
5223 
5224  if (error != CL_SUCCESS) {
5225  if (err != NULL) {
5226  *err = error;
5227  }
5228  }
5229  else {
5230  Device device = context.getInfo<CL_CONTEXT_DEVICES>()[0];
5231 
5232  default_ = CommandQueue(context, device, 0, &error);
5233 
5234  detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_COMMAND_QUEUE_ERR);
5235  if (err != NULL) {
5236  *err = error;
5237  }
5238  }
5239 
5240  detail::fence();
5241 
5242  default_error_ = error;
5243  // Assume writes will propagate eventually...
5244  default_initialized_ = __DEFAULT_INITIALIZED;
5245 
5246  detail::fence();
5247 
5248  if (err != NULL) {
5249  *err = default_error_;
5250  }
5251  return default_;
5252 
5253  }
5254 
5255  CommandQueue() { }
5256 
5257  CommandQueue(const CommandQueue& commandQueue) : detail::Wrapper<cl_type>(commandQueue) { }
5258 
5259  CommandQueue(const cl_command_queue& commandQueue) : detail::Wrapper<cl_type>(commandQueue) { }
5260 
5261  CommandQueue& operator = (const CommandQueue& rhs)
5262  {
5263  if (this != &rhs) {
5264  detail::Wrapper<cl_type>::operator=(rhs);
5265  }
5266  return *this;
5267  }
5268 
5269  CommandQueue& operator = (const cl_command_queue& rhs)
5270  {
5271  detail::Wrapper<cl_type>::operator=(rhs);
5272  return *this;
5273  }
5274 
5275  template <typename T>
5276  cl_int getInfo(cl_command_queue_info name, T* param) const
5277  {
5278  return detail::errHandler(
5279  detail::getInfo(
5280  &::clGetCommandQueueInfo, object_, name, param),
5281  __GET_COMMAND_QUEUE_INFO_ERR);
5282  }
5283 
5284  template <cl_int name> typename
5285  detail::param_traits<detail::cl_command_queue_info, name>::param_type
5286  getInfo(cl_int* err = NULL) const
5287  {
5288  typename detail::param_traits<
5289  detail::cl_command_queue_info, name>::param_type param;
5290  cl_int result = getInfo(name, &param);
5291  if (err != NULL) {
5292  *err = result;
5293  }
5294  return param;
5295  }
5296 
5297  cl_int enqueueReadBuffer(
5298  const Buffer& buffer,
5299  cl_bool blocking,
5300  ::size_t offset,
5301  ::size_t size,
5302  void* ptr,
5303  const VECTOR_CLASS<Event>* events = NULL,
5304  Event* event = NULL) const
5305  {
5306  cl_event tmp;
5307  cl_int err = detail::errHandler(
5308  ::clEnqueueReadBuffer(
5309  object_, buffer(), blocking, offset, size,
5310  ptr,
5311  (events != NULL) ? (cl_uint) events->size() : 0,
5312  (events != NULL && events->size() > 0) ? (cl_event*) &events->front() : NULL,
5313  (event != NULL) ? &tmp : NULL),
5314  __ENQUEUE_READ_BUFFER_ERR);
5315 
5316  if (event != NULL && err == CL_SUCCESS)
5317  *event = tmp;
5318 
5319  return err;
5320  }
5321

5323  const Buffer& buffer,
5324  cl_bool blocking,
5325  ::size_t offset,
5326  ::size_t size,
5327  const void* ptr,
5328  const VECTOR_CLASS<Event>* events = NULL,
5329  Event* event = NULL) const
5330  {
5331  cl_event tmp;
5332  cl_int err = detail::errHandler(
5333  ::clEnqueueWriteBuffer(
5334  object_, buffer(), blocking, offset, size,
5335  ptr,
5336  (events != NULL) ? (cl_uint) events->size() : 0,
5337  (events != NULL && events->size() > 0) ? (cl_event*) &events->front() : NULL,
5338  (event != NULL) ? &tmp : NULL),
5339  __ENQUEUE_WRITE_BUFFER_ERR);
5340 
5341  if (event != NULL && err == CL_SUCCESS)
5342  *event = tmp;
5343 
5344  return err;
5345  }

5359  object_, src(), dst(), src_offset, dst_offset, size,
5360  (events != NULL) ? (cl_uint) events->size() : 0,
5361  (events != NULL && events->size() > 0) ? (cl_event*) &events->front() : NULL,
5362  (event != NULL) ? &tmp : NULL),
5363  __ENQEUE_COPY_BUFFER_ERR);
5364 
5365  if (event != NULL && err == CL_SUCCESS)
5366  *event = tmp;
5367 
5368  return err;
5369  }

5401  (event != NULL) ? &tmp : NULL),

5403

5405  *event = tmp;
5406

5408  }

5500  Event* event = NULL) const
5501  {

5505  object_,

5508  sizeof(PatternType),
5509  offset,
5510  size,
