5512  (events != NULL && events->size() > 0) ? (cl_event*) &events->front() : NULL,
5513  (event != NULL) ? &tmp : NULL),

5515

5731  cl_int enqueueCopyBufferToImage(
5732  const Buffer& src,
5733  const Image& dst,
5734  ::size_t src_offset,
5735  const size_t<3>& dst_origin,
5736  const size_t<3>& region,
5737  const VECTOR_CLASS<Event>* events = NULL,
5738  Event* event = NULL) const
5739  {
5740  cl_event tmp;
5741  cl_int err = detail::errHandler(
5742  ::clEnqueueCopyBufferToImage(
5743  object_, src(), dst(), src_offset,
5744  (const ::size_t *) dst_origin, (const ::size_t *) region,
5745  (events != NULL) ? (cl_uint) events->size() : 0,
5746  (events != NULL && events->size() > 0) ? (cl_event*) &events->front() : NULL,
5747  (event != NULL) ? &tmp : NULL),
5748  __ENQUEUE_COPY_BUFFER_TO_IMAGE_ERR);
5749 
5750  if (event != NULL && err == CL_SUCCESS)
5751  *event = tmp;
5752 
5753  return err;
5754  }
5755 
5756  void* enqueueMapBuffer(
5757  const Buffer& buffer,
5758  cl_bool blocking,
5759  cl_map_flags flags,
5760  ::size_t offset,
5761  ::size_t size,
5762  const VECTOR_CLASS<Event>* events = NULL,
5763  Event* event = NULL,
5764  cl_int* err = NULL) const
5765  {
5766  cl_int error;
5767  void * result = ::clEnqueueMapBuffer(
5768  object_, buffer(), blocking, flags, offset, size,
5769  (events != NULL) ? (cl_uint) events->size() : 0,
5770  (events != NULL && events->size() > 0) ? (cl_event*) &events->front() : NULL,
5771  (cl_event*) event,
5772  &error);
5773 
5774  detail::errHandler(error, __ENQUEUE_MAP_BUFFER_ERR);
5775  if (err != NULL) {
5776  *err = error;
5777  }
5778  return result;
5779  }
5780 
5781  void* enqueueMapImage(
5782  const Image& buffer,
5783  cl_bool blocking,
5784  cl_map_flags flags,
5785  const size_t<3>& origin,
5786  const size_t<3>& region,
5787  ::size_t * row_pitch,
5788  ::size_t * slice_pitch,
5789  const VECTOR_CLASS<Event>* events = NULL,
5790  Event* event = NULL,
5791  cl_int* err = NULL) const
5792  {
5793  cl_int error;
5794  void * result = ::clEnqueueMapImage(
5795  object_, buffer(), blocking, flags,
5796  (const ::size_t *) origin, (const ::size_t *) region,
5797  row_pitch, slice_pitch,
5798  (events != NULL) ? (cl_uint) events->size() : 0,
5799  (events != NULL && events->size() > 0) ? (cl_event*) &events->front() : NULL,
5800  (cl_event*) event,
5801  &error);
5802 
5803  detail::errHandler(error, __ENQUEUE_MAP_IMAGE_ERR);
5804  if (err != NULL) {
5805  *err = error;
5806  }
5807  return result;
5808  }

5810  cl_int enqueueUnmapMemObject(
5811  const Memory& memory,
5812  void* mapped_ptr,
5813  const VECTOR_CLASS<Event>* events = NULL,
5814  Event* event = NULL) const
5815  {
5816  cl_event tmp;
5817  cl_int err = detail::errHandler(
5818  ::clEnqueueUnmapMemObject(
5819  object_, memory(), mapped_ptr,
5820  (events != NULL) ? (cl_uint) events->size() : 0,
5821  (events != NULL && events->size() > 0) ? (cl_event*) &events->front() : NULL,
5822  (event != NULL) ? &tmp : NULL),
5823  __ENQUEUE_UNMAP_MEM_OBJECT_ERR);
5824 
5825  if (event != NULL && err == CL_SUCCESS)
5826  *event = tmp;
5827 
5828  return err;
5829  }

5832 
5843  cl_int enqueueMarkerWithWaitList(
5844  const VECTOR_CLASS<Event> *events = 0,
5845  Event *event = 0)
5846  {
5847  cl_event tmp;
5848  cl_int err = detail::errHandler(
5849  ::clEnqueueMarkerWithWaitList(
5850  object_,
5851  (events != NULL) ? (cl_uint) events->size() : 0,
5852  (events != NULL && events->size() > 0) ? (cl_event*) &events->front() : NULL,
5853  (event != NULL) ? &tmp : NULL),
5854  __ENQUEUE_MARKER_WAIT_LIST_ERR);
5855 
5856  if (event != NULL && err == CL_SUCCESS)
5857  *event = tmp;
5858 
5859  return err;
5860  }

5874  const VECTOR_CLASS<Event> *events = 0,
5875  Event *event = 0)
5876  {

5878  cl_int err = detail::errHandler(
5879  ::clEnqueueBarrierWithWaitList(
5880  object_,
5881  (events != NULL) ? (cl_uint) events->size() : 0,
5882  (events != NULL && events->size() > 0) ? (cl_event*) &events->front() : NULL,
5883  (event != NULL) ? &tmp : NULL),
5884  __ENQUEUE_BARRIER_WAIT_LIST_ERR);
5885 
5886  if (event != NULL && err == CL_SUCCESS)
5887  *event = tmp;
5888 
5889  return err;
5890  }
5891 
5896  cl_int enqueueMigrateMemObjects(
5897  const VECTOR_CLASS<Memory> &memObjects,
5898  cl_mem_migration_flags flags,
5899  const VECTOR_CLASS<Event>* events = NULL,
5900  Event* event = NULL
5901  )
5902  {
5903  cl_event tmp;
5904 
5905  cl_mem* localMemObjects = static_cast<cl_mem*>(alloca(memObjects.size() * sizeof(cl_mem)));
5906  for( int i = 0; i < (int)memObjects.size(); ++i ) {
5907  localMemObjects[i] = memObjects[i]();
5908  }
5909 
5910 
5911  cl_int err = detail::errHandler(
5912  ::clEnqueueMigrateMemObjects(
5913  object_,
5914  (cl_uint)memObjects.size(),
5915  static_cast<const cl_mem*>(localMemObjects),
5916  flags,
5917  (events != NULL) ? (cl_uint) events->size() : 0,
5918  (events != NULL && events->size() > 0) ? (cl_event*) &events->front() : NULL,
5919  (event != NULL) ? &tmp : NULL),
5920  __ENQUEUE_UNMAP_MEM_OBJECT_ERR);
5921 
5922  if (event != NULL && err == CL_SUCCESS)
5923  *event = tmp;
5924 
5925  return err;
5926  }
5927 #endif // #if defined(CL_VERSION_1_2)
5928 
5929  cl_int enqueueNDRangeKernel(
5930  const Kernel& kernel,
5931  const NDRange& offset,
5932  const NDRange& global,
5933  const NDRange& local = NullRange,
5934  const VECTOR_CLASS<Event>* events = NULL,
5935  Event* event = NULL) const
5936  {
5937  cl_event tmp;
5938  cl_int err = detail::errHandler(
5939  ::clEnqueueNDRangeKernel(
5940  object_, kernel(), (cl_uint) global.dimensions(),
5941  offset.dimensions() != 0 ? (const ::size_t*) offset : NULL,
5942  (const ::size_t*) global,
5943  local.dimensions() != 0 ? (const ::size_t*) local : NULL,
5944  (events != NULL) ? (cl_uint) events->size() : 0,
5945  (events != NULL && events->size() > 0) ? (cl_event*) &events->front() : NULL,
5946  (event != NULL) ? &tmp : NULL),
5947  __ENQUEUE_NDRANGE_KERNEL_ERR);
5948 
5949  if (event != NULL && err == CL_SUCCESS)
5950  *event = tmp;
5951 
5952  return err;
5953  }
5954 
5955  cl_int enqueueTask(
5956  const Kernel& kernel,
5957  const VECTOR_CLASS<Event>* events = NULL,
5958  Event* event = NULL) const
5959  {
5960  cl_event tmp;
5961  cl_int err = detail::errHandler(
5962  ::clEnqueueTask(
5963  object_, kernel(),
5964  (events != NULL) ? (cl_uint) events->size() : 0,
5965  (events != NULL && events->size() > 0) ? (cl_event*) &events->front() : NULL,
5966  (event != NULL) ? &tmp : NULL),
5967  __ENQUEUE_TASK_ERR);
5968 
5969  if (event != NULL && err == CL_SUCCESS)
5970  *event = tmp;
5971 
5972  return err;
5973  }
5974 
5975  cl_int enqueueNativeKernel(
5976  void (CL_CALLBACK *userFptr)(void *),
5977  std::pair<void*, ::size_t> args,
5978  const VECTOR_CLASS<Memory>* mem_objects = NULL,
5979  const VECTOR_CLASS<const void*>* mem_locs = NULL,
5980  const VECTOR_CLASS<Event>* events = NULL,
5981  Event* event = NULL) const
5982  {
5983  cl_mem * mems = (mem_objects != NULL && mem_objects->size() > 0)
5984  ? (cl_mem*) alloca(mem_objects->size() * sizeof(cl_mem))
5985  : NULL;
5986 
5987  if (mems != NULL) {
5988  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < mem_objects->size(); i++) {
5989  mems[i] = ((*mem_objects)[i])();
5990  }
5991  }
5992 
5993  cl_event tmp;
5994  cl_int err = detail::errHandler(
5995  ::clEnqueueNativeKernel(
5996  object_, userFptr, args.first, args.second,
5997  (mem_objects != NULL) ? (cl_uint) mem_objects->size() : 0,
5998  mems,
5999  (mem_locs != NULL) ? (const void **) &mem_locs->front() : NULL,
6000  (events != NULL) ? (cl_uint) events->size() : 0,
6001  (events != NULL && events->size() > 0) ? (cl_event*) &events->front() : NULL,
6002  (event != NULL) ? &tmp : NULL),
6003  __ENQUEUE_NATIVE_KERNEL);
6004 
6005  if (event != NULL && err == CL_SUCCESS)
6006  *event = tmp;
6007 
6008  return err;
6009  }
6010 
6014 #if defined(CL_USE_DEPRECATED_OPENCL_1_1_APIS) || (defined(CL_VERSION_1_1) && !defined(CL_VERSION_1_2))
6015  CL_EXT_PREFIX__VERSION_1_1_DEPRECATED
6016  cl_int enqueueMarker(Event* event = NULL) const CL_EXT_SUFFIX__VERSION_1_1_DEPRECATED
6017  {
6018  return detail::errHandler(
6019  ::clEnqueueMarker(object_, (cl_event*) event),
6020  __ENQUEUE_MARKER_ERR);
6021  }
6022 
6023  CL_EXT_PREFIX__VERSION_1_1_DEPRECATED
6024  cl_int enqueueWaitForEvents(const VECTOR_CLASS<Event>& events) const CL_EXT_SUFFIX__VERSION_1_1_DEPRECATED
6025  {
6026  return detail::errHandler(
6027  ::clEnqueueWaitForEvents(
6028  object_,
6029  (cl_uint) events.size(),
6030  (const cl_event*) &events.front()),
6031  __ENQUEUE_WAIT_FOR_EVENTS_ERR);
6032  }
6033 #endif // #if defined(CL_VERSION_1_1)

6035  cl_int enqueueAcquireGLObjects(
6036  const VECTOR_CLASS<Memory>* mem_objects = NULL,
6037  const VECTOR_CLASS<Event>* events = NULL,
6038  Event* event = NULL) const
6039  {
6040  cl_event tmp;
6041  cl_int err = detail::errHandler(
6042  ::clEnqueueAcquireGLObjects(
6043  object_,
6044  (mem_objects != NULL) ? (cl_uint) mem_objects->size() : 0,
6045  (mem_objects != NULL) ? (const cl_mem *) &mem_objects->front(): NULL,
6046  (events != NULL) ? (cl_uint) events->size() : 0,
6047  (events != NULL && events->size() > 0) ? (cl_event*) &events->front() : NULL,
6048  (event != NULL) ? &tmp : NULL),
6049  __ENQUEUE_ACQUIRE_GL_ERR);
6050 
6051  if (event != NULL && err == CL_SUCCESS)
6052  *event = tmp;
6053 
6054  return err;
6055  }

6060  Event* event = NULL) const

6064  ::clEnqueueReleaseGLObjects(
6065  object_,
6066  (mem_objects != NULL) ? (cl_uint) mem_objects->size() : 0,
6067  (mem_objects != NULL) ? (const cl_mem *) &mem_objects->front(): NULL,
6068  (events != NULL) ? (cl_uint) events->size() : 0,
6069  (events != NULL && events->size() > 0) ? (cl_event*) &events->front() : NULL,
6070  (event != NULL) ? &tmp : NULL),
6071  __ENQUEUE_RELEASE_GL_ERR);
6072 
6073  if (event != NULL && err == CL_SUCCESS)
6074  *event = tmp;
6075 
6076  return err;
6077  }

6085  cl_command_queue command_queue, cl_uint num_objects,

6090  const VECTOR_CLASS<Memory>* mem_objects = NULL,
6091  const VECTOR_CLASS<Event>* events = NULL,
6092  Event* event = NULL) const
6093  {

6095 #if defined(CL_VERSION_1_2)

6098  cl_platform_id platform = device.getInfo<CL_DEVICE_PLATFORM>();
6099  __INIT_CL_EXT_FCN_PTR_PLATFORM(platform, clEnqueueAcquireD3D10ObjectsKHR);
6100 #endif

6103 #endif

6107  pfn_clEnqueueAcquireD3D10ObjectsKHR(
6108  object_,

6110  (mem_objects != NULL) ? (const cl_mem *) &mem_objects->front(): NULL,
6111  (events != NULL) ? (cl_uint) events->size() : 0,
6112  (events != NULL) ? (cl_event*) &events->front() : NULL,
6113  (event != NULL) ? &tmp : NULL),

6115

6119  return err;

6124  const VECTOR_CLASS<Event>* events = NULL,

6131  cl_platform_id platform = device.getInfo<CL_DEVICE_PLATFORM>();
6132  __INIT_CL_EXT_FCN_PTR_PLATFORM(platform, clEnqueueReleaseD3D10ObjectsKHR);
6133 #endif // #if defined(CL_VERSION_1_2)
6134 #if defined(CL_VERSION_1_1)

6141  object_,

6143  (mem_objects != NULL) ? (const cl_mem *) &mem_objects->front(): NULL,

6154 #endif
6155 
6159 #if defined(CL_USE_DEPRECATED_OPENCL_1_1_APIS) || (defined(CL_VERSION_1_1) && !defined(CL_VERSION_1_2))
6160  CL_EXT_PREFIX__VERSION_1_1_DEPRECATED
6161  cl_int enqueueBarrier() const CL_EXT_SUFFIX__VERSION_1_1_DEPRECATED
6162  {
6163  return detail::errHandler(
6164  ::clEnqueueBarrier(object_),
6165  __ENQUEUE_BARRIER_ERR);
6166  }
6167 #endif // #if defined(CL_VERSION_1_1)
6168 
6169  cl_int flush() const
6170  {
6171  return detail::errHandler(::clFlush(object_), __FLUSH_ERR);
6172  }
6173 
6174  cl_int finish() const
6175  {
6176  return detail::errHandler(::clFinish(object_), __FINISH_ERR);
6177  }
6178 };
6179 
6180 #ifdef _WIN32
6181 __declspec(selectany) volatile int CommandQueue::default_initialized_ = __DEFAULT_NOT_INITIALIZED;
6182 __declspec(selectany) CommandQueue CommandQueue::default_;
6183 __declspec(selectany) volatile cl_int CommandQueue::default_error_ = CL_SUCCESS;
6184 #else
6185 __attribute__((weak)) volatile int CommandQueue::default_initialized_ = __DEFAULT_NOT_INITIALIZED;
6186 __attribute__((weak)) CommandQueue CommandQueue::default_;
6187 __attribute__((weak)) volatile cl_int CommandQueue::default_error_ = CL_SUCCESS;
6188 #endif
6189 
6190 template< typename IteratorType >
6191 Buffer::Buffer(
6192  const Context &context,
6193  IteratorType startIterator,
6194  IteratorType endIterator,
6195  bool readOnly,
6196  bool useHostPtr,
6197  cl_int* err)
6198 {
6199  typedef typename std::iterator_traits<IteratorType>::value_type DataType;
6200  cl_int error;
6201 
6202  cl_mem_flags flags = 0;
6203  if( readOnly ) {
6204  flags |= CL_MEM_READ_ONLY;
6205  }
6206  else {
6207  flags |= CL_MEM_READ_WRITE;
6208  }
6209  if( useHostPtr ) {
6210  flags |= CL_MEM_USE_HOST_PTR;
6211  }
6212 
6213  ::size_t size = sizeof(DataType)*(endIterator - startIterator);
6214 
6215  if( useHostPtr ) {
6216  object_ = ::clCreateBuffer(context(), flags, size, static_cast<DataType*>(&*startIterator), &error);
6217  } else {
6218  object_ = ::clCreateBuffer(context(), flags, size, 0, &error);
6219  }
6220 
6221  detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_BUFFER_ERR);
6222  if (err != NULL) {
6223  *err = error;
6224  }
6225 
6226  if( !useHostPtr ) {
6227  CommandQueue queue(context, 0, &error);
6228  detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_BUFFER_ERR);
6229  if (err != NULL) {
6230  *err = error;
6231  }
6232 
6233  error = cl::copy(queue, startIterator, endIterator, *this);
6234  detail::errHandler(error, __CREATE_BUFFER_ERR);
6235  if (err != NULL) {
6236  *err = error;
6237  }
6238  }
6239 }
6240 
6241 inline cl_int enqueueReadBuffer(
6242  const Buffer& buffer,
6243  cl_bool blocking,
6244  ::size_t offset,
6245  ::size_t size,
6246  void* ptr,
6247  const VECTOR_CLASS<Event>* events = NULL,
6248  Event* event = NULL)
6249 {
6250  cl_int error;
6251  CommandQueue queue = CommandQueue::getDefault(&error);
6252 
6253  if (error != CL_SUCCESS) {
6254  return error;
6255  }
6256 
6257  return queue.enqueueReadBuffer(buffer, blocking, offset, size, ptr, events, event);
6258 }
6259 
6260 inline cl_int enqueueWriteBuffer(
6261  const Buffer& buffer,
6262  cl_bool blocking,
6263  ::size_t offset,
6264  ::size_t size,
6265  const void* ptr,
6266  const VECTOR_CLASS<Event>* events = NULL,
6267  Event* event = NULL)
6268 {
6269  cl_int error;
6270  CommandQueue queue = CommandQueue::getDefault(&error);
6271 
6272  if (error != CL_SUCCESS) {
6273  return error;
6274  }
6275 
6276  return queue.enqueueWriteBuffer(buffer, blocking, offset, size, ptr, events, event);
6277 }
6278 
6279 inline void* enqueueMapBuffer(
6280  const Buffer& buffer,
6281  cl_bool blocking,
6282  cl_map_flags flags,
6283  ::size_t offset,
6284  ::size_t size,
6285  const VECTOR_CLASS<Event>* events = NULL,
6286  Event* event = NULL,
6287  cl_int* err = NULL)
6288 {
6289  cl_int error;
6290  CommandQueue queue = CommandQueue::getDefault(&error);
6291  detail::errHandler(error, __ENQUEUE_MAP_BUFFER_ERR);
6292  if (err != NULL) {
6293  *err = error;
6294  }
6295 
6296  void * result = ::clEnqueueMapBuffer(
6297  queue(), buffer(), blocking, flags, offset, size,
6298  (events != NULL) ? (cl_uint) events->size() : 0,
6299  (events != NULL && events->size() > 0) ? (cl_event*) &events->front() : NULL,
6300  (cl_event*) event,
6301  &error);
6302 
6303  detail::errHandler(error, __ENQUEUE_MAP_BUFFER_ERR);
6304  if (err != NULL) {
6305  *err = error;
6306  }
6307  return result;
6308 }
6309 
6310 inline cl_int enqueueUnmapMemObject(
6311  const Memory& memory,
6312  void* mapped_ptr,
6313  const VECTOR_CLASS<Event>* events = NULL,
6314  Event* event = NULL)
6315 {
6316  cl_int error;
6317  CommandQueue queue = CommandQueue::getDefault(&error);
6318  detail::errHandler(error, __ENQUEUE_MAP_BUFFER_ERR);
6319  if (error != CL_SUCCESS) {
6320  return error;
6321  }
6322 
6323  cl_event tmp;
6324  cl_int err = detail::errHandler(
6325  ::clEnqueueUnmapMemObject(
6326  queue(), memory(), mapped_ptr,
6327  (events != NULL) ? (cl_uint) events->size() : 0,
6328  (events != NULL && events->size() > 0) ? (cl_event*) &events->front() : NULL,
6329  (event != NULL) ? &tmp : NULL),
6330  __ENQUEUE_UNMAP_MEM_OBJECT_ERR);
6331 
6332  if (event != NULL && err == CL_SUCCESS)
6333  *event = tmp;
6334 
6335  return err;
6336 }
6337 
6338 inline cl_int enqueueCopyBuffer(
6339  const Buffer& src,
6340  const Buffer& dst,
6341  ::size_t src_offset,
6342  ::size_t dst_offset,
6343  ::size_t size,
6344  const VECTOR_CLASS<Event>* events = NULL,
6345  Event* event = NULL)
6346 {
6347  cl_int error;
6348  CommandQueue queue = CommandQueue::getDefault(&error);
6349 
6350  if (error != CL_SUCCESS) {
6351  return error;
6352  }
6353 
6354  return queue.enqueueCopyBuffer(src, dst, src_offset, dst_offset, size, events, event);
6355 }
6356 
6362 template< typename IteratorType >
6363 inline cl_int copy( IteratorType startIterator, IteratorType endIterator, cl::Buffer &buffer )
6364 {
6365  cl_int error;
6366  CommandQueue queue = CommandQueue::getDefault(&error);
6367  if (error != CL_SUCCESS)
6368  return error;
6369 
6370  return cl::copy(queue, startIterator, endIterator, buffer);
6371 }
6372 
6378 template< typename IteratorType >
6379 inline cl_int copy( const cl::Buffer &buffer, IteratorType startIterator, IteratorType endIterator )
6380 {
6381  cl_int error;
6382  CommandQueue queue = CommandQueue::getDefault(&error);
6383  if (error != CL_SUCCESS)
6384  return error;
6385 
6386  return cl::copy(queue, buffer, startIterator, endIterator);
6387 }
6388 
6394 template< typename IteratorType >
6395 inline cl_int copy( const CommandQueue &queue, IteratorType startIterator, IteratorType endIterator, cl::Buffer &buffer )
6396 {
6397  typedef typename std::iterator_traits<IteratorType>::value_type DataType;
6398  cl_int error;
6399 
6400  ::size_t length = endIterator-startIterator;
6401  ::size_t byteLength = length*sizeof(DataType);
6402 
6403  DataType *pointer =
6404  static_cast<DataType*>(queue.enqueueMapBuffer(buffer, CL_TRUE, CL_MAP_WRITE, 0, byteLength, 0, 0, &error));
6405  // if exceptions enabled, enqueueMapBuffer will throw
6406  if( error != CL_SUCCESS ) {
6407  return error;
6408  }
6409 #if defined(_MSC_VER)
6410  std::copy(
6411  startIterator,
6412  endIterator,
6413  stdext::checked_array_iterator<DataType*>(
6414  pointer, length));
6415 #else
6416  std::copy(startIterator, endIterator, pointer);
6417 #endif
6418  Event endEvent;
6419  error = queue.enqueueUnmapMemObject(buffer, pointer, 0, &endEvent);
6420  // if exceptions enabled, enqueueUnmapMemObject will throw
6421  if( error != CL_SUCCESS ) {
6422  return error;
6423  }
6424  endEvent.wait();
6425  return CL_SUCCESS;
6426 }
6427 
6433 template< typename IteratorType >
6434 inline cl_int copy( const CommandQueue &queue, const cl::Buffer &buffer, IteratorType startIterator, IteratorType endIterator )
6435 {
6436  typedef typename std::iterator_traits<IteratorType>::value_type DataType;
6437  cl_int error;
6438 
6439  ::size_t length = endIterator-startIterator;
6440  ::size_t byteLength = length*sizeof(DataType);
6441 
6442  DataType *pointer =
6443  static_cast<DataType*>(queue.enqueueMapBuffer(buffer, CL_TRUE, CL_MAP_READ, 0, byteLength, 0, 0, &error));
6444  // if exceptions enabled, enqueueMapBuffer will throw
6445  if( error != CL_SUCCESS ) {
6446  return error;
6447  }
6448  std::copy(pointer, pointer + length, startIterator);
6449  Event endEvent;
6450  error = queue.enqueueUnmapMemObject(buffer, pointer, 0, &endEvent);
6451  // if exceptions enabled, enqueueUnmapMemObject will throw
6452  if( error != CL_SUCCESS ) {
6453  return error;
6454  }
6455  endEvent.wait();
6456  return CL_SUCCESS;
6457 }
6458 
6459 #if defined(CL_VERSION_1_1)
6460 inline cl_int enqueueReadBufferRect(
6461  const Buffer& buffer,
6462  cl_bool blocking,
6463  const size_t<3>& buffer_offset,
6464  const size_t<3>& host_offset,
6465  const size_t<3>& region,
6466  ::size_t buffer_row_pitch,
6467  ::size_t buffer_slice_pitch,
6468  ::size_t host_row_pitch,
6469  ::size_t host_slice_pitch,
6470  void *ptr,
6471  const VECTOR_CLASS<Event>* events = NULL,
6472  Event* event = NULL)
6473 {
6474  cl_int error;
6475  CommandQueue queue = CommandQueue::getDefault(&error);
6476 
6477  if (error != CL_SUCCESS) {
6478  return error;
6479  }
6480 
6481  return queue.enqueueReadBufferRect(
6482  buffer,
6483  blocking,
6484  buffer_offset,
6485  host_offset,
6486  region,
6487  buffer_row_pitch,
6488  buffer_slice_pitch,
6489  host_row_pitch,
6490  host_slice_pitch,
6491  ptr,
6492  events,
6493  event);
6494 }
6495 
6496 inline cl_int enqueueWriteBufferRect(
6497  const Buffer& buffer,
6498  cl_bool blocking,
6499  const size_t<3>& buffer_offset,
6500  const size_t<3>& host_offset,
6501  const size_t<3>& region,
6502  ::size_t buffer_row_pitch,
6503  ::size_t buffer_slice_pitch,
6504  ::size_t host_row_pitch,
6505  ::size_t host_slice_pitch,
6506  void *ptr,
6507  const VECTOR_CLASS<Event>* events = NULL,
6508  Event* event = NULL)
6509 {
6510  cl_int error;
6511  CommandQueue queue = CommandQueue::getDefault(&error);
6512 
6513  if (error != CL_SUCCESS) {
6514  return error;
6515  }
6516 
6517  return queue.enqueueWriteBufferRect(
6518  buffer,
6519  blocking,
6520  buffer_offset,
6521  host_offset,
6522  region,
6523  buffer_row_pitch,
6524  buffer_slice_pitch,
6525  host_row_pitch,
6526  host_slice_pitch,
6527  ptr,
6528  events,
6529  event);
6530 }

6532 inline cl_int enqueueCopyBufferRect(
6533  const Buffer& src,
6534  const Buffer& dst,
6535  const size_t<3>& src_origin,
6536  const size_t<3>& dst_origin,
6537  const size_t<3>& region,
6538  ::size_t src_row_pitch,
6539  ::size_t src_slice_pitch,
6540  ::size_t dst_row_pitch,
6541  ::size_t dst_slice_pitch,
6542  const VECTOR_CLASS<Event>* events = NULL,
6543  Event* event = NULL)
6544 {
6545  cl_int error;
6546  CommandQueue queue = CommandQueue::getDefault(&error);
6547 
6548  if (error != CL_SUCCESS) {
6549  return error;
6550  }
6551 
6552  return queue.enqueueCopyBufferRect(
6553  src,
6554  dst,
6555  src_origin,
6556  dst_origin,
6557  region,
6558  src_row_pitch,
6559  src_slice_pitch,
6560  dst_row_pitch,
6561  dst_slice_pitch,
6562  events,
6563  event);
6564 }
6565 #endif

6679 inline cl_int enqueueCopyBufferToImage(
6680  const Buffer& src,
6681  const Image& dst,
6682  ::size_t src_offset,
6683  const size_t<3>& dst_origin,
6684  const size_t<3>& region,
6685  const VECTOR_CLASS<Event>* events = NULL,
6686  Event* event = NULL)
6687 {

6690

6696  src,
6697  dst,

6699  dst_origin,

6704 
6705 
6706 inline cl_int flush(void)
6707 {
6708  cl_int error;
6709  CommandQueue queue = CommandQueue::getDefault(&error);
6710 
6711  if (error != CL_SUCCESS) {
6712  return error;
6713  }
6714 
6715  return queue.flush();
6716 }
6717 
6718 inline cl_int finish(void)
6719 {
6720  cl_int error;
6721  CommandQueue queue = CommandQueue::getDefault(&error);
6722 
6723  if (error != CL_SUCCESS) {
6724  return error;
6725  }
6726 
6727 
6728  return queue.finish();
6729 }
6730 
6731 // Kernel Functor support
6732 // New interface as of September 2011
6733 // Requires the C++11 std::tr1::function (note do not support TR1)
6734 // Visual Studio 2010 and GCC 4.2
6735 
6736 struct EnqueueArgs
6737 {
6738  CommandQueue queue_;
6739  const NDRange offset_;
6740  const NDRange global_;
6741  const NDRange local_;
6742  VECTOR_CLASS<Event> events_;
6743 
6744  EnqueueArgs(NDRange global) :
6745  queue_(CommandQueue::getDefault()),
6746  offset_(NullRange),
6747  global_(global),
6748  local_(NullRange)
6749  {
6750 
6751  }
6752 
6753  EnqueueArgs(NDRange global, NDRange local) :
6754  queue_(CommandQueue::getDefault()),
6755  offset_(NullRange),
6756  global_(global),
6757  local_(local)
6758  {
6759 
6760  }
6761 
6762  EnqueueArgs(NDRange offset, NDRange global, NDRange local) :
6763  queue_(CommandQueue::getDefault()),
6764  offset_(offset),
6765  global_(global),
6766  local_(local)
6767  {
6768 
6769  }
6770 
6771  EnqueueArgs(Event e, NDRange global) :
6772  queue_(CommandQueue::getDefault()),
6773  offset_(NullRange),
6774  global_(global),
6775  local_(NullRange)
6776  {
6777  events_.push_back(e);
6778  }
6779 
6780  EnqueueArgs(Event e, NDRange global, NDRange local) :
6781  queue_(CommandQueue::getDefault()),
6782  offset_(NullRange),
6783  global_(global),
6784  local_(local)
6785  {
6786  events_.push_back(e);
6787  }
6788 
6789  EnqueueArgs(Event e, NDRange offset, NDRange global, NDRange local) :
6790  queue_(CommandQueue::getDefault()),
6791  offset_(offset),
6792  global_(global),
6793  local_(local)
6794  {
6795  events_.push_back(e);
6796  }
6797 
6798  EnqueueArgs(const VECTOR_CLASS<Event> &events, NDRange global) :
6799  queue_(CommandQueue::getDefault()),
6800  offset_(NullRange),
6801  global_(global),
6802  local_(NullRange),
6803  events_(events)
6804  {
6805 
6806  }
6807 
6808  EnqueueArgs(const VECTOR_CLASS<Event> &events, NDRange global, NDRange local) :
6809  queue_(CommandQueue::getDefault()),
6810  offset_(NullRange),
6811  global_(global),
6812  local_(local),
6813  events_(events)
6814  {
6815 
6816  }
6817 
6818  EnqueueArgs(const VECTOR_CLASS<Event> &events, NDRange offset, NDRange global, NDRange local) :
6819  queue_(CommandQueue::getDefault()),
6820  offset_(offset),
6821  global_(global),
6822  local_(local),
6823  events_(events)
6824  {
6825 
6826  }
6827 
6828  EnqueueArgs(CommandQueue &queue, NDRange global) :
6829  queue_(queue),
6830  offset_(NullRange),
6831  global_(global),
6832  local_(NullRange)
6833  {
6834 
6835  }
6836 
6837  EnqueueArgs(CommandQueue &queue, NDRange global, NDRange local) :
6838  queue_(queue),
6839  offset_(NullRange),
6840  global_(global),
6841  local_(local)
6842  {
6843 
6844  }
6845 
6846  EnqueueArgs(CommandQueue &queue, NDRange offset, NDRange global, NDRange local) :
6847  queue_(queue),
6848  offset_(offset),
6849  global_(global),
6850  local_(local)
6851  {
6852 
6853  }
6854 
6855  EnqueueArgs(CommandQueue &queue, Event e, NDRange global) :
6856  queue_(queue),
6857  offset_(NullRange),
6858  global_(global),
6859  local_(NullRange)
6860  {
6861  events_.push_back(e);
6862  }
6863 
6864  EnqueueArgs(CommandQueue &queue, Event e, NDRange global, NDRange local) :
6865  queue_(queue),
6866  offset_(NullRange),
6867  global_(global),
6868  local_(local)
6869  {
6870  events_.push_back(e);
6871  }
6872 
6873  EnqueueArgs(CommandQueue &queue, Event e, NDRange offset, NDRange global, NDRange local) :
6874  queue_(queue),
6875  offset_(offset),
6876  global_(global),
6877  local_(local)
6878  {
6879  events_.push_back(e);
6880  }
6881 
6882  EnqueueArgs(CommandQueue &queue, const VECTOR_CLASS<Event> &events, NDRange global) :
6883  queue_(queue),
6884  offset_(NullRange),
6885  global_(global),
6886  local_(NullRange),
6887  events_(events)
6888  {
6889 
6890  }
6891 
6892  EnqueueArgs(CommandQueue &queue, const VECTOR_CLASS<Event> &events, NDRange global, NDRange local) :
6893  queue_(queue),
6894  offset_(NullRange),
6895  global_(global),
6896  local_(local),
6897  events_(events)
6898  {
6899 
6900  }
6901 
6902  EnqueueArgs(CommandQueue &queue, const VECTOR_CLASS<Event> &events, NDRange offset, NDRange global, NDRange local) :
6903  queue_(queue),
6904  offset_(offset),
6905  global_(global),
6906  local_(local),
6907  events_(events)
6908  {
6909 
6910  }
6911 };
6912 
6913 namespace detail {
6914 
6915 class NullType {};
6916 
6917 template<int index, typename T0>
6918 struct SetArg
6919 {
6920  static void set (Kernel kernel, T0 arg)
6921  {
6922  kernel.setArg(index, arg);
6923  }
6924 };
6925 
6926 template<int index>
6927 struct SetArg<index, NullType>
6928 {
6929  static void set (Kernel, NullType)
6930  {
6931  }
6932 };
6933 
6934 template <
6935  typename T0, typename T1, typename T2, typename T3,
6936  typename T4, typename T5, typename T6, typename T7,
6937  typename T8, typename T9, typename T10, typename T11,
6938  typename T12, typename T13, typename T14, typename T15,
6939  typename T16, typename T17, typename T18, typename T19,
6940  typename T20, typename T21, typename T22, typename T23,
6941  typename T24, typename T25, typename T26, typename T27,
6942  typename T28, typename T29, typename T30, typename T31
6943 >
6944 class KernelFunctorGlobal
6945 {
6946 private:
6947  Kernel kernel_;
6948 
6949 public:
6950  KernelFunctorGlobal(
6951  Kernel kernel) :
6952  kernel_(kernel)
6953  {}
6954 
6955  KernelFunctorGlobal(
6956  const Program& program,
6957  const STRING_CLASS name,
6958  cl_int * err = NULL) :
6959  kernel_(program, name.c_str(), err)
6960  {}
6961 
6962  Event operator() (
6963  const EnqueueArgs& args,
6964  T0 t0,
6965  T1 t1 = NullType(),
6966  T2 t2 = NullType(),
6967  T3 t3 = NullType(),
6968  T4 t4 = NullType(),
6969  T5 t5 = NullType(),
6970  T6 t6 = NullType(),
6971  T7 t7 = NullType(),
6972  T8 t8 = NullType(),
6973  T9 t9 = NullType(),
6974  T10 t10 = NullType(),
6975  T11 t11 = NullType(),
6976  T12 t12 = NullType(),
6977  T13 t13 = NullType(),
6978  T14 t14 = NullType(),
6979  T15 t15 = NullType(),
6980  T16 t16 = NullType(),
6981  T17 t17 = NullType(),
6982  T18 t18 = NullType(),
6983  T19 t19 = NullType(),
6984  T20 t20 = NullType(),
6985  T21 t21 = NullType(),
6986  T22 t22 = NullType(),
6987  T23 t23 = NullType(),
6988  T24 t24 = NullType(),
6989  T25 t25 = NullType(),
6990  T26 t26 = NullType(),
6991  T27 t27 = NullType(),
6992  T28 t28 = NullType(),
6993  T29 t29 = NullType(),
6994  T30 t30 = NullType(),
6995  T31 t31 = NullType()
6996  )
6997  {
6998  Event event;
6999  SetArg<0, T0>::set(kernel_, t0);
7000  SetArg<1, T1>::set(kernel_, t1);
7001  SetArg<2, T2>::set(kernel_, t2);
7002  SetArg<3, T3>::set(kernel_, t3);
7003  SetArg<4, T4>::set(kernel_, t4);
7004  SetArg<5, T5>::set(kernel_, t5);
7005  SetArg<6, T6>::set(kernel_, t6);
7006  SetArg<7, T7>::set(kernel_, t7);
7007  SetArg<8, T8>::set(kernel_, t8);
7008  SetArg<9, T9>::set(kernel_, t9);
7009  SetArg<10, T10>::set(kernel_, t10);
7010  SetArg<11, T11>::set(kernel_, t11);
7011  SetArg<12, T12>::set(kernel_, t12);
7012  SetArg<13, T13>::set(kernel_, t13);
7013  SetArg<14, T14>::set(kernel_, t14);
7014  SetArg<15, T15>::set(kernel_, t15);
7015  SetArg<16, T16>::set(kernel_, t16);
7016  SetArg<17, T17>::set(kernel_, t17);
7017  SetArg<18, T18>::set(kernel_, t18);
7018  SetArg<19, T19>::set(kernel_, t19);
7019  SetArg<20, T20>::set(kernel_, t20);
7020  SetArg<21, T21>::set(kernel_, t21);
7021  SetArg<22, T22>::set(kernel_, t22);
7022  SetArg<23, T23>::set(kernel_, t23);
7023  SetArg<24, T24>::set(kernel_, t24);
7024  SetArg<25, T25>::set(kernel_, t25);
7025  SetArg<26, T26>::set(kernel_, t26);
7026  SetArg<27, T27>::set(kernel_, t27);
7027  SetArg<28, T28>::set(kernel_, t28);
7028  SetArg<29, T29>::set(kernel_, t29);
7029  SetArg<30, T30>::set(kernel_, t30);
7030  SetArg<31, T31>::set(kernel_, t31);
7031 
7032  args.queue_.enqueueNDRangeKernel(
7033  kernel_,
7034  args.offset_,
7035  args.global_,
7036  args.local_,
7037  &args.events_,
7038  &event);
7039 
7040  return event;
7041  }
7042 
7043 };
7044 
7045 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
7046 
7047 
7048 template<
7049  typename T0,
7050  typename T1,
7051  typename T2,
7052  typename T3,
7053  typename T4,
7054  typename T5,
7055  typename T6,
7056  typename T7,
7057  typename T8,
7058  typename T9,
7059  typename T10,
7060  typename T11,
7061  typename T12,
7062  typename T13,
7063  typename T14,
7064  typename T15,
7065  typename T16,
7066  typename T17,
7067  typename T18,
7068  typename T19,
7069  typename T20,
7070  typename T21,
7071  typename T22,
7072  typename T23,
7073  typename T24,
7074  typename T25,
7075  typename T26,
7076  typename T27,
7077  typename T28,
7078  typename T29,
7079  typename T30,
7080  typename T31>
7081 struct functionImplementation_
7082 {
7083  typedef detail::KernelFunctorGlobal<
7084  T0,
7085  T1,
7086  T2,
7087  T3,
7088  T4,
7089  T5,
7090  T6,
7091  T7,
7092  T8,
7093  T9,
7094  T10,
7095  T11,
7096  T12,
7097  T13,
7098  T14,
7099  T15,
7100  T16,
7101  T17,
7102  T18,
7103  T19,
7104  T20,
7105  T21,
7106  T22,
7107  T23,
7108  T24,
7109  T25,
7110  T26,
7111  T27,
7112  T28,
7113  T29,
7114  T30,
7115  T31> FunctorType;
7116 
7117  FunctorType functor_;
7118 
7119  functionImplementation_(const FunctorType &functor) :
7120  functor_(functor)
7121  {
7122 
7123  #if (defined(_WIN32) && defined(_VARIADIC_MAX) && (_VARIADIC_MAX < 32))
7124  // Fail variadic expansion for dev11
7125  static_assert(0, "Visual Studio has a hard limit of argument count for a std::function expansion. Please define _VARIADIC_MAX to be 10. If you need more arguments than that VC12 and below cannot support it.");
7126  #endif
7127 
7128  }
7129 
7131  typedef Event result_type;
7132 
7134  typedef Event type_(
7135  const EnqueueArgs&,
7136  T0,
7137  T1,
7138  T2,
7139  T3,
7140  T4,
7141  T5,
7142  T6,
7143  T7,
7144  T8,
7145  T9,
7146  T10,
7147  T11,
7148  T12,
7149  T13,
7150  T14,
7151  T15,
7152  T16,
7153  T17,
7154  T18,
7155  T19,
7156  T20,
7157  T21,
7158  T22,
7159  T23,
7160  T24,
7161  T25,
7162  T26,
7163  T27,
7164  T28,
7165  T29,
7166  T30,
7167  T31);
7168 
7169  Event operator()(
7170  const EnqueueArgs& enqueueArgs,
7171  T0 arg0,
7172  T1 arg1,
7173  T2 arg2,
7174  T3 arg3,
7175  T4 arg4,
7176  T5 arg5,
7177  T6 arg6,
7178  T7 arg7,

11936  functor_(functor)

11942  #endif
